translation.en: [male presenter] Next, we induct one of the most pivotal players in Texas A&M history.
translation.zh: 接下来 我们介绍德州农工史上最关键的一位球员

translation.en: -[commentators] -Oh, my gracious.
translation.zh: -我的天啊-对

translation.en: -Yep. -How about that?
translation.zh: 怎么样？

translation.en: [excitedly] A&M did it. They just did it.
translation.zh: 农工大学做到了 他们就这样做到了

translation.en: [presenter] …won a Heisman Trophy.
translation.zh: 赢了一个海斯曼奖杯

translation.en: -[commentators] -Here comes Johnny Football.
translation.zh: -强尼·橄榄球来了-强尼·橄榄球来了

translation.en: The Heisman Trophy, for the first time, has gone to a freshman quarterback.
translation.zh: 海斯曼奖杯第一次颁给了大一新生四分卫

translation.en: He is must-watch TV.
translation.zh: 他是必看的电视节目

translation.en: [presenter] He is a living legend, Johnny Manziel.
translation.zh: 他是活生生的传奇 强尼·曼泽尔

translation.en: [Johnny] Let me paint a little picture for you of how I'm able to sit here today
translation.zh: 让我为你勾勒一个我是如何今天 29岁的时候

translation.en: and be on this stage at 29 years old.
translation.zh: 坐在这里 登上这个舞台的画面

translation.en: When I stepped on campus in 2011, it didn't look like this.
translation.zh: 当我在2011年踏进校园的时候不是像这样的

translation.en: [crowd] Johnny Football!
translation.zh: 强尼·橄榄球！

translation.en: [commentator] He's taken on Rolling Stones, Beatles status.
translation.zh: 他有滚石乐队的外貌披头士乐队的状态

translation.en: This stadium didn't look like this…
translation.zh: 以前体育场看起来不是这样的

translation.en: …we didn't have the buzz that we have today.
translation.zh: 没有今天的这种热闹

translation.en: [man] …brought A&M back to national prominence.
translation.zh: …让农工重回全国瞩目

translation.en: [commentator] In the preseason, hardly anyone knew who Johnny Manziel was.
translation.zh: 在季前赛里 几乎没人知道强尼·曼泽尔是谁

translation.en: It'd be very easy to turn your back on some of the things I was doing in my life,
translation.zh: 我做过的一些事很容易被忽略

translation.en: and I live with a lot of regret.
translation.zh: 我现在活在后悔中

translation.en: [woman] New trouble for Johnny Manziel.
translation.zh: 强尼·曼泽尔有了新麻烦

translation.en: -[man] …under investigation for assault. -Manziel has gone into rehab.
translation.zh: -警方正在调查侵犯-曼泽尔去了戒毒所

translation.en: The family fears he is spiraling out of control.
translation.zh: 家人担心他会失控

translation.en: [Johnny] But at the same time, I've lived with a lot of pride.
translation.zh: 但同时 我也活在自豪中

translation.en: I am beyond thankful for each and every Aggie in this room
translation.zh: 我非常感谢这个房间里的每个德州农工大学的人

translation.en: that's supported me through the good,
translation.zh: 支持我经历美好的事

translation.en: through the bad,
translation.zh: 支持我经历不好的事

translation.en: and through times that really just didn't even make sense for me.
translation.zh: 支持我经历那些我自己都搞不懂的岁月

translation.en: From the bottom of my heart, I wanna say thank you very much.
translation.zh: 我从心底非常感谢你们我想说一声非常感谢

translation.en: Thanks and Gig 'em.
translation.zh: 谢谢农工

translation.en: [man] Ooh, I loved it when you were here.
translation.zh: 我很喜欢你在这里的时候

translation.en: Through all the shenanigans, I still loved it.
translation.zh: 经历了那么多恶作剧 我依然爱你

translation.en: Thank you very much.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -What's up? -[boy] You're why I love A&M.
translation.zh: -你好吗？-你就是我爱农工的原因

translation.en: [Johnny] Thank you, bro.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -What are you doing these days? -Living in Scottsdale, enjoying life.
translation.zh: -你最近在做什么？-住在斯科茨代尔 享受生活

translation.en: You got your private airplane yet?
translation.zh: 你有私人飞机了吗？

translation.en: Not yet. I'm working on it.
translation.zh: 还没有 正在为此努力

translation.en: -We gotta do the money sign. -I got you.
translation.zh: -我们来做个数钱手势-我知道

translation.en: -Thank you. -Good to see you, guys.
translation.zh: -谢谢-很高兴见到你

translation.en: -Thanks for everything. -Good to see you.
translation.zh: -谢谢你做的一切-很高兴见到你

translation.en: -[man] Good to see you. -Good to see you.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你

translation.en: How are you? Thank you, bro. Good to see you guys.
translation.zh: 你好吗？谢谢 很高兴见到你们

translation.en: Good to see you. I appreciate it.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你 我很感激

translation.en: -[indistinct chatter, laughter] -[soft music playing] [man] Oh, what the fuck?
translation.zh: （亚利桑那州 斯科茨代尔）

translation.en: You do not change bats in the middle of the series, dawg.
translation.zh: 你不能在系列赛的中间换球拍 老兄

translation.en: [Johnny] There is who you are as a football player,
translation.zh: 你作为橄榄球运动员什么样是一方面

translation.en: and then, there is who you are as a human being,
translation.zh: 你作为一个人什么样 是另一方面

translation.en: and the two, for me, were just really different.
translation.zh: 这两个对我而言是完全不同的

translation.en: I almost felt like I had an alter ego.
translation.zh: 我都感觉自己是有分身一样

translation.en: I wanted to be Johnny Football. Johnny Football never had a bad time.
translation.zh: 我想成为强尼·橄榄球强尼·橄榄球从来没有过不好的时光

translation.en: So, when people asked me, "Do you like the nickname Johnny Football?"
translation.zh: 所以当人们问：“你喜欢强尼·橄榄球这个绰号吗？”

translation.en: I fucking loved it.
translation.zh: 我超喜欢

translation.en: I thought it was awesome.
translation.zh: 我觉得很棒

translation.en: JFF, Johnny Fucking Football. What's up?
translation.zh: 强尼·橄榄球 你好吗？

translation.en: -[Johnny panting heavily] -[owl hooting]
translation.zh: （体坛秘史）

translation.en: -[crowd cheering] -[referee blowing whistle]
translation.zh: （脱序的天才四分卫）

translation.en: [Johnny] Football is everything in Texas.
translation.zh: 橄榄球在德州就是一切

translation.en: You know, If you don't play football, you're either too big of a pussy to play,
translation.zh: 如果你不玩橄榄球要么是你太弱了没法玩

translation.en: or you're just not any good.
translation.zh: 要么就是你一点都不行

translation.en: [Johnny] Town closes down when it's Friday night and there's game.
translation.zh: 镇子在周五晚上关门 有比赛

translation.en: The football team was the lifeline.
translation.zh: 橄榄球队就是生命线

translation.en: [presenter] Johnny Football!
translation.zh: 强尼·橄榄球！

translation.en: First time I met Johnny was in middle school.
translation.zh: 我第一次见到强尼是在初中

translation.en: We both loved video games, um, we both loved football,
translation.zh: 我们都喜欢电子游戏 都喜欢橄榄球

translation.en: we both loved girls,
translation.zh: 我们都喜欢姑娘

translation.en: so we had all the most important things in life in common.
translation.zh: 所以我们的共同点都是人生最重要的东西

translation.en: The Johnny I know is a kid
translation.zh: 我认识的强尼是个孩子

translation.en: who wanted to be the very best football player you could possibly be
translation.zh: 想尽力成为最好的橄榄球员

translation.en: and, after that, go drink some beers out on a ranch,
translation.zh: 之后去牧场上喝啤酒

translation.en: drive a 20-year-old truck over to do it.
translation.zh: 开20多年的老卡车过去牧场

translation.en: [Johnny] Called him Uncle Nate. He was like my right-hand man.
translation.zh: 叫他内特叔叔 他就像我的左右手

translation.en: We were just good old country boys.
translation.zh: 我们都是乡下男孩

translation.en: If you've seen Friday Night Lights, you've seen anything like that…
translation.zh: 如果你看过 《胜利之光》之类的…

translation.en: -Clear eyes, full hearts… -Can't lose!
translation.zh: -清澈的眼睛 饱满的心-不能输！

translation.en: …that's what Kerrville was.
translation.zh: …克尔维尔就是这样

translation.en: The intensity, all of it. The, you know, hard-ass dads.
translation.zh: 那种强度什么的  硬汉

translation.en: Johnny was born on my birthday.
translation.zh: 强尼是在我生日那天出生的

translation.en: ♪ Happy birthday, dear Jonathan… ♪
translation.zh: 生日快乐 亲爱的强尼森…

translation.en: [Paul] We have the same mannerisms, the same birthdays. He's me made over, pretty much.
translation.zh: 我们有同样的习惯、生日他基本就是复制的一个我

translation.en: [woman] There he is.
translation.zh: 他来了

translation.en: Paul!
translation.zh: 保罗！

translation.en: Discipline in our family pretty much came from me.
translation.zh: 我们家的纪律大部分是从我这来的

translation.en: You just teach 'em to do the right thing all the time.
translation.zh: 你总是教他们做正确的事

translation.en: We truly are each other's best friends.
translation.zh: 我们真的是彼此最好的朋友

translation.en: End of my 4th-grade year, we moved to Kerrville,
translation.zh: 我四年级结束时我们搬到了克尔维尔

translation.en: and it was a totally different pace of life for us.
translation.zh: 这对我们而言 生活节奏完全不同

translation.en: [Nate] Tivy High School was very much a military-style football program,
translation.zh: 蒂维高中是个很军事化的橄榄球训练项目

translation.en: and all of your best friends are doing it right next to you,
translation.zh: 所有你最好的朋友都在你身边做这个

translation.en: so you're not gonna be the asshole that stands out. Just fall in line.
translation.zh: 所以你不想做鹤立鸡群的人他们说什么 你就做什么

translation.en: My dad wanted me to be in that program because of how strict they ran it.
translation.zh: 爸爸因为他们的严格想让我加入那个项目

translation.en: Your first period of the day, 7 a.m., is football.
translation.zh: 你一天的第一节课早上七点就是橄榄球

translation.en: Different weight room stations every single day. Six stations, six coaches,
translation.zh: 每天不同的举重室健身站六个站 六个教练

translation.en: and then after school, you practice again, so we had a double dose every single day.
translation.zh: 放学后你又练习所以我们每天都练双倍的量

translation.en: The Kerrville way, the Tivy way,
translation.zh: 克尔维尔的方式 蒂维的方式

translation.en: the "Tivy fight never dies," that whole mantra that we had
translation.zh: “蒂维的战斗永不终止”是我们的全部咒语

translation.en: lasted until the second you walked outta that school when you were a senior.
translation.zh: 一直到你高三走出学校的那一刻

translation.en: [Paul] In his 10th-grade year, Johnny got the start.
translation.zh: 在他十年级的时候强尼得到了开始的机会

translation.en: And I remember sitting in the stands and people are like,
translation.zh: 我记得坐在台上 人们在说

translation.en: "Who is this Manziel kid?" "There's some new kid starting tonight."
translation.zh: “这个叫曼泽尔的孩子是谁？”“今晚有个新来的孩子”

translation.en: I was like, "Oh my gosh, here we go."
translation.zh: 我心里想：“我的天啊 来了”

translation.en: [commentator] Here come the Antlers!
translation.zh: 鹿角来了！

translation.en: We ran a play called "tin trap", which is pretty much catch the ball,
translation.zh: 我们弄了一个叫锡陷阱的战术基本上就是接球

translation.en: they're gonna trap the noseguard,
translation.zh: 他们会困住防守尖峰

translation.en: and you're gonna run straight up the middle as fast as you can.
translation.zh: 你要以最快的速度直接跑到中间

translation.en: It just parted like the Red Sea.
translation.zh: 它就像红海一样分开了

translation.en: You know, just a perfect alley right down the middle.
translation.zh: 你知道 就是中间有一条完美的小巷

translation.en: Took off, touchdown.
translation.zh: 突破拦截 触地得分

translation.en: [commentator] Touchdown, Tivy.
translation.zh: 触地得分 蒂维

translation.en: And there's a yellow flag. Holding. It's called back.
translation.zh: 有个黄牌 拉人犯规 不作数了

translation.en: So now we're on the 10-yard line.
translation.zh: 所以现在我们在十码线

translation.en: The coach signals in to play "Sky 2".
translation.zh: 教练发信号打天空二战术

translation.en: I look at the wristband.
translation.zh: 我看了一下腕带

translation.en: I look down, I look up, I look at the sideline,
translation.zh: 我低头看 往上看 我看球场边线

translation.en: and this motherfucker called tin trap again.
translation.zh: 这家伙又要搞锡陷阱

translation.en: [commentator] Snap to Manziel. Looks like he's gonna take this one to the house!
translation.zh: 开球发给曼泽尔看来他会把这个带到达阵区！

translation.en: [Johnny] Take it from the 10-yard line all the way to the house for a 90-yard touchdown.
translation.zh: 从十码线一直到达阵区进行90码触地得分

translation.en: [commentator] A 90-yard touchdown from Johnny Manziel.
translation.zh: 强尼·曼泽尔90码线触地得分

translation.en: [presenter] It all starts here
translation.zh: 一切都是从这里开始的

translation.en: and on thousands of football fields like this all over the country.
translation.zh: 在全国成千上万个这样的橄榄球场上

translation.en: It's where the quarterbacks of tomorrow learn their future skills.
translation.zh: 这里是未来四分卫学习未来技能的地方

translation.en: [man] Everybody wants to be the quarterback.
translation.zh: 每个人都想做四分卫

translation.en: Nobody's watching the nose tackle except for the nose tackle's wife and mother.
translation.zh: 没有人关注尖峰除了尖峰的老婆和妈妈

translation.en: I think the way that I played quarterback, it was just a different kind of football.
translation.zh: 我觉得我打四分卫的方式是一种不同的橄榄球

translation.en: I always watched Brett Favre growing up, a guy who'd run around and make a ton of plays.
translation.zh: 我看着布雷特·法弗长大他跑来跑去 打了很多战术球

translation.en: Brett Favre, and I like Vince Young.
translation.zh: 布雷特·法弗 我喜欢文森·杨格

translation.en: Vince Young is who I'd like to have my style known as.
translation.zh: 文森·杨格是我希望自己拥有的风格

translation.en: There's a play that I will remember for the rest of my life.
translation.zh: 有一个战术球我会记得一辈子

translation.en: Vince Young, pump fake…
translation.zh: 文森·杨格 假传

translation.en: [commentator] Great pump fake.
translation.zh: 文森·杨格 假传 很棒的假传

translation.en: …and the defender jumped.
translation.zh: 防守队员跳了起来

translation.en: Say goodbye to Vince Young.
translation.zh: 跟文森·杨格说再见

translation.en: It fit me how I wanted to play football. It fit me how I naturally played football.
translation.zh: 符合我想打橄榄球的风格很适合我自然打球的方式

translation.en: Always try to keep the elbow at least parallel with the shoulder.
translation.zh: 一定要始终保持肘部至少与肩膀平行

translation.en: As a quarterback,
translation.zh: 作为四分卫

translation.en: square your shoulders up with the line of scrimmage before delivering the ball.
translation.zh: 传球前把你的肩膀往后拉和争球线对齐

translation.en: You wanna see the ball secure, not flopping around.
translation.zh: 你想看到球稳住 而不是到处乱跑

translation.en: [Johnny] Even though I was 5'10", maybe 5'11" on a good day,
translation.zh: 就算我是179厘米高状态好有时候可能是180厘米

translation.en: you know, I didn't even have to think about it.
translation.zh: 你知道 我甚至不用去想它

translation.en: [commentator] Manziel. Touchdown, Antlers.
translation.zh: 曼泽尔 触地得分 鹿角

translation.en: It was just run around and play backyard football,
translation.zh: 只是跑来跑去 凭直觉随性打橄榄球

translation.en: and don't let that guy tackle you. Throw it to the guy that's open.
translation.zh: 别让那家伙来擒抱你把球扔给身边没人的队友

translation.en: [Nate] I remember he straight-up hurdled a dude that was standing up straight.
translation.zh: 我记得他直接跳起越过了一个站直的兄弟

translation.en: He was playing with children, and he would manhandle them.
translation.zh: 他简直是在和一群孩子比赛他会暴力推搡他们

translation.en: [commentator] He had seven touchdowns in the first half last week against Fredericksburg.
translation.zh: 他在上周对阵弗雷德里克斯堡时在上半场有七次触地得分

translation.en: You look at his numbers, and he has not disappointed it.
translation.zh: 你看他的数字 他没让人有失望

translation.en: [commentator 1] He picked up the Associated Press Player of the Year award.
translation.zh: 他获得了美联社年度最佳球员奖

translation.en: [commentator 2] Johnny Manziel certainly lives up to the hype.
translation.zh: 强尼·曼泽尔绝对不负众望

translation.en: [announcer] Touchdown. Touchdown, Johnny Manziel.
translation.zh: 触地得分 触地得分 强尼·曼泽尔

translation.en: [commentator 3] Coming into senior season, check out these numbers. 3,609 yards.
translation.zh: 进入他的高年级赛季 看看这些数字 -3609码-75次触地得分？

translation.en: Seventy-five touchdowns?
translation.zh: -3609码-75次触地得分？

translation.en: I thought that was a typo. I thought that was for his career, not this season!
translation.zh: 我以为那是打错了 我以为那是他的整个职业生涯 不是这个赛季！

translation.en: [Johnny] My senior year, I started to get recruited a little bit.
translation.zh: 我高三的时候开始有人雇佣我了

translation.en: Not anything crazy,
translation.zh: 不是有多疯狂

translation.en: but I wanted to play football at the University of Texas.
translation.zh: 但我想在德州大学打橄榄球

translation.en: But I'd never really gotten anything
translation.zh: 但除了基本普通的招募信

translation.en: other than your basic, normal recruiting letters.
translation.zh: 我什么都没得到

translation.en: [Paul] He grew up with Longhorn T-shirts, Longhorn hats,
translation.zh: 他是穿着长角牛的T恤和帽子长大的

translation.en: Longhorn this, Longhorn that,
translation.zh: 长角牛这个 长角牛那个

translation.en: and I really think that he always thought he'd go there, and it just didn't work out.
translation.zh: 我真的认为他总是觉得自己会去那里 但没行得通

translation.en: [Johnny] I remember walking into the office one day,
translation.zh: 我记得有一天走进办公室

translation.en: and my coach goes, "Texas A&M just offered you a full ride."
translation.zh: 我的教练说：“德州农工给你提供了全额奖学金”

translation.en: [narrator] It is not a simple thing, the making of a quarterback.
translation.zh: 这不是简单的事 打造一个四分卫

translation.en: It is the stuff of which legends are made.
translation.zh: 正是这些东西可以打造一个传奇

translation.en: [man narrating] Texas A&M was all male, all military for a long time.
translation.zh: 得州农工大学很长时间以来都是全部男性 全部军事化的

translation.en: A&M's always had a reputation as the blue-collar school of the state.
translation.zh: 农工一直有美国蓝领学校的声誉

translation.en: It's the roll-up-your-sleeves, it's the gritty school.
translation.zh: 是撸起袖子 是坚韧的学校

translation.en: You know, back in the day,
translation.zh: 以前

translation.en: it's where the people from the rural parts of Texas came to college.
translation.zh: 是德州乡村地区的人上大学的地方

translation.en: It's been interesting, the last 20 years or so,
translation.zh: 过去的20多年里很有趣

translation.en: because college football's changing.
translation.zh: 因为大学橄榄球在改变

translation.en: [broadcaster] The Big 12 Conference is about to get smaller.
translation.zh: 12大联盟即将缩小

translation.en: Texas A&M University gave its notice to the athletic conference,
translation.zh: 德州农工大学通知了运动联盟

translation.en: said it plans to leave the league by next July.
translation.zh: 说要在明年七月前离开联盟

translation.en: One of the things that we talk about in collegiate athletics,
translation.zh: 我们在运动联盟中谈论的其中一件事

translation.en: the athletic department is the front porch to the university.
translation.zh: 运动部是大学的前廊

translation.en: For more and more universities across the country,
translation.zh: 对于全国越来越多的大学而言

translation.en: success on the football field now equals a higher profile for the entire school.
translation.zh: 现在在橄榄球场上的成功和提高整个学校的知名度一样

translation.en: [woman narrator] A&M is moving towards a jump to the Southeast Conference
translation.zh: 农工正在向东南联盟迈进

translation.en: as SEC is home to teams like Florida, Auburn, and LSU.
translation.zh: 东南联盟是佛罗里达、奥本和密歇根州立大学球队的大本营

translation.en: We're talking about exposure, brand recognition,
translation.zh: 我们讨论的是曝光度、品牌知名度

translation.en: billion-dollar decisions here, and more.
translation.zh: 和十亿美元的决定等等

translation.en: Welcome to the SEC.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到东南联盟

translation.en: They were basically saying, "This is a defining moment in our program's history,"
translation.zh: 他们基本上是在说：“这是我们项目历史上的一个决定性时刻”

translation.en: but there were a lot of people that were wondering, "Is this the best move?"
translation.zh: 但也有很多人在想“这是最好的选择吗？”

translation.en: [commentator] We're talking about a football program
translation.zh: 我们说的是一个

translation.en: that's three games over .500 the last nine seasons.
translation.zh: 过去九个赛季三场胜率超过五成的橄榄球项目

translation.en: We're not talking about a national superpower here.
translation.zh: 我们这里说的不是一个国家级的超级强队

translation.en: At the time, we would've been considered middle of the road in the Big 12,
translation.zh: 当时 我们被认为是12大联盟中的中游球队

translation.en: and there was a national narrative that Texas A&M cannot compete in the SEC.
translation.zh: 当时有一种全国性的说法认为德州农工无法在东南联盟竞争

translation.en: [commentator] The SEC has five national championships in a row.
translation.zh: 东南联盟连续五次获得全国冠军

translation.en: They're going into the toughest league in the country. We all know that.
translation.zh: 他们将进入国内最艰难的联赛我们都知道这一点

translation.en: And it's the toughest by a long shot.
translation.zh: 绝对是最艰难的

translation.en: [Billy] And then there was a coaching change.
translation.zh: 然后教练也换了

translation.en: I wanna welcome Kevin Sumlin as new head football coach at Texas A&M.
translation.zh: 我想欢迎凯文·萨姆林成为德州农工的新任橄榄球队总教练

translation.en: They hired Kevin Sumlin,
translation.zh: 他们雇佣了凯文·萨姆林

translation.en: and he had an offensive coordinator by the name of Kliff Kingsbury,
translation.zh: 他有一个叫克里夫·金斯伯里的进攻协调员

translation.en: and he had this wide-open, high-flying offense.
translation.zh: 而他的进攻完全开放 气势汹汹

translation.en: [journalist] How does this offense translate going against SEC defense?
translation.zh: 对抗东南联盟的防守这种进攻将如何诠释？

translation.en: Hell, we'll find out. We'll find out.
translation.zh: 对 我们拭目以待

translation.en: [Billy] But what no one knew
translation.zh: 但没有人知道的是

translation.en: was they had this kid from Kerrville, Texas,
translation.zh: 他们有一个来自德克萨斯州科尔维尔的孩子

translation.en: this quarterback named Johnny Manziel.
translation.zh: 这个叫强尼·曼泽尔的四分卫

translation.en: One of Texas A&M's potential starting quarterbacks
translation.zh: 德州农工潜在的首发四分卫之一

translation.en: was arrested early this morning in Northgate.
translation.zh: 今早在诺斯盖特被捕

translation.en: Patrol officers say they saw two men fighting. One of the two was Manziel.
translation.zh: 巡警说他们看到两个人在打架一个是曼泽尔

translation.en: Johnny and one of his crappy high school friends were down in College Station,
translation.zh: 强尼和他一个糟糕的高中朋友去了卡城

translation.en: ends up turning into a fight.
translation.zh: 最后演变成一场打斗

translation.en: Johnny has a fake ID on him, goes to jail.
translation.zh: 强尼身上带着假身份证 进了监狱

translation.en: You know, I don't have much of a recollection
translation.zh: 除了在布莱恩县监狱光着膀子

translation.en: other than waking up shirtless on a concrete bench in Bryan County Jail,
translation.zh: 在水泥长凳上醒来其他我都不记得了

translation.en: and they said that wasn't very, um, normal of my character.
translation.zh: 他们说我这个性格做出这样的事情不太正常

translation.en: I guess looking back now, maybe it is a little bit normal
translation.zh: 我想现在回想起来 也许这对我的性格来说有点正常

translation.en: for my character.
translation.zh: 也许这对我的性格来说有点正常

translation.en: Johnny'd gotten in some trouble, but I remember Kliff Kingsbury telling me,
translation.zh: 强尼惹上了麻烦但我记得克里夫·金斯伯里告诉我

translation.en: "You know that's the guy, right? No matter what."
translation.zh: “你知道就是他 对吧？不管怎样”

translation.en: When he got in-line in fall camp, it was like a different human.
translation.zh: 当他在秋季夏令营排队时感觉像是另外一个人

translation.en: It was like, "All right, y'all about to see why."
translation.zh: 他说：“好吧你们马上就知道为什么了”

translation.en: Our first game was at home at Kyle Field against the University of Florida,
translation.zh: 我们的第一场比赛是在凯尔体育场主场对战佛罗里达大学

translation.en: and Johnny Manziel's making his first start.
translation.zh: 强尼·曼泽尔第一次参赛

translation.en: [commentator] Steps it outside, nothing doing.
translation.zh: 走到外面 没有成功

translation.en: Manziel just couldn't beat 'em with his arm.
translation.zh: 曼泽尔就是没法用胳膊战胜他们

translation.en: Rough, rough sledding.
translation.zh: 艰难时期

translation.en: We end up losing 21-17, something like that.
translation.zh: 最后我们以17 - 21输掉了比赛

translation.en: I'm walking home, get to the end of the street right in front of the house,
translation.zh: 我走回家 走到街的尽头就在房子前面

translation.en: and there are so many "for sale" signs in my yard,
translation.zh: 我的院子里有很多“出售”的牌子

translation.en: and I just remember looking at 'em being like, "Welcome to the fucking SEC."
translation.zh: 我只记得我看着它们说“欢迎来到该死的东南联盟”

translation.en: But then, our second game was a road game at SMU.
translation.zh: 但我们的第二场比赛是在南卫理公会大学的客场比赛

translation.en: [Billy] Now, I remember Kliff telling me after that first game,
translation.zh: 我记得克里夫在第一场比赛后告诉我

translation.en: "I should've just let him do his thing."
translation.zh: “我就应该让他做他要做的事”

translation.en: And from that point and on, I think he did that.
translation.zh: 从那时起 我觉得他那样做了

translation.en: And then Johnny happened.
translation.zh: 然后强尼出现了

translation.en: [commentator] First down and ten, Manziel pumps once. Now he is forced out of the pocket.
translation.zh: 第一次进攻 十码 曼泽尔挺进现在他被逼出了口袋区域

translation.en: He's running, and some of those guys back there don't know.
translation.zh: 他在跑 后面的人还不知道

translation.en: Oh, broken tackle. 20. Cutting back to his left.
translation.zh: 突破擒抱 20码 向他的左边迂回过去

translation.en: He's gonna get in. That's a touchdown.
translation.zh: 他会进去的 触地得分

translation.en: It just all happened, so free and so natural,
translation.zh: 一切都发生得那么自由、那么自然

translation.en: and was just everything aligning right with the universe,
translation.zh: 一切都与宇宙协调一致

translation.en: the way that it should be.
translation.zh: 这是它应该有的样子

translation.en: [commentator] He got away from that guy. Now he's gonna throw under duress.
translation.zh: 他从那人那里逃出来了现在他要在胁迫下扔球了

translation.en: And he made a catch! Manziel is a magician today.
translation.zh: 他接住了！曼泽尔今天是个魔术师

translation.en: It's unbelievable. We're watching him grow up here.
translation.zh: 难以置信 我们看着他在这里长大的

translation.en: At A&M, we had a saying. It was "Win or lose, we booze."
translation.zh: 在农工 我们有句谚语那就是：“赢或输我们都喝醉”

translation.en: And it was real tr… real true.
translation.zh: 这是真的

translation.en: [commentator] Here's Manziel, breaks a tackle.
translation.zh: 曼泽尔冲破了一个擒抱

translation.en: -In the end zone! Yeah! -[crowd cheering]
translation.zh: 在达阵区！

translation.en: 70 to 14. A&M improves to two and one.
translation.zh: 70比14 农工提高战绩到二胜一负

translation.en: People think of athletes as being these super disciplined, on a diet,
translation.zh: 人们认为运动员是非常自律的 节食

translation.en: just being absolutely committed to their craft.
translation.zh: 完全致力于他们的身体

translation.en: [commentator] Manziel going deep. It's caught. This may be 80 yards.
translation.zh: 曼齐尔往深处进入 被接住了这可能有80码

translation.en: [Nate] I never saw him look at a playbook ever. I've never seen it happen.
translation.zh: 我从没见他看过战术手册我从来没见过这种事发生

translation.en: After football, he didn't talk about football.
translation.zh: 打完橄榄球 他从不谈论橄榄球

translation.en: So it was as if he was just doing this thing on the side,
translation.zh: 所以就好像他只是在做这件事当副业

translation.en: and the reason wasn't to be badass and win and do all these unbelievable feats,
translation.zh: 原因不是为了很厉害 赢得胜利做出这些令人难以置信的壮举

translation.en: it was for what happens after you win.
translation.zh: 而是为了你赢了之后的事

translation.en: [commentator] He's got the first down. He's got the end zone. Touchdown!
translation.zh: 他第一次进攻 他到了达阵区 触地得分！

translation.en: [Billy] I've never seen the A&M fan base, the power brokers,
translation.zh: 我从没见过农工的粉丝群 权力掮客

translation.en: and everybody as confident as they were, because it was lightning in a bottle.
translation.zh: 每个人都像当时那么自信因为这取得了很难的成功

translation.en: And A&M fans could say, "That's my guy."
translation.zh: 农工的粉丝可以说：“那是我兄弟”

translation.en: "He's one of us."
translation.zh: “他是我们的一员”

translation.en: [Kliff] As everything's blowing up, I think he just rolled with it.
translation.zh: 一切都在被吹嘘我想他就那样接受了

translation.en: So we're going to Mississippi State on Friday,
translation.zh: 所以我们周五要去密西西比州

translation.en: Friday morning we see these pictures… [laughs]
translation.zh: 周五早上我们看到这些图片

translation.en: …and he's in a Scooby-Doo outfit, and you can tell he's obviously had a couple of cocktails.
translation.zh: 他穿着史酷比的衣服显然他喝了几杯鸡尾酒

translation.en: [Johnny] I remember opening my eyes and seeing our grad assistant saying,
translation.zh: 我记得我睁开眼睛看到我们的团队助理说

translation.en: "Kliff send me over here to come and grab you," gave him a little shit about it, and he's like,
translation.zh: “克里夫让我来抓你”让他很难堪 然后他说

translation.en: "Listen, bud, we're in the thick of an SEC race right now, so we gotta have you on the field."
translation.zh: “听着 兄弟 我们正在东南联盟比赛中 我们要你上场”

translation.en: And he rolls out there hungover, goes through the walk-through, he's pouring sweat.
translation.zh: 他醉醺醺走过去训练 满身大汗

translation.en: And I just looked at him and said, "You better fucking play good."
translation.zh: 我看着他说：“你最好认真比赛”

translation.en: [commentator] Rolling right. He's wide open. He is gonna get another first down.
translation.zh: 向右滚 他空位很大他会再来一个第一次进攻

translation.en: He's after the, a-- He's cutting back to his right.
translation.zh: 他在… 他在往右转

translation.en: He just scored! I don't know how he did it.
translation.zh: 他刚刚得分了！我不知道他是怎么做到的

translation.en: [Kliff] He plays one of the best games he's ever played,
translation.zh: 他参加过最棒的比赛之一

translation.en: and for the rest of the season, I always put the ball in his hands.
translation.zh: 于是整个赛季剩下的时间我都把球交给他

translation.en: [commentator] And the legend of No 2 continues to build.
translation.zh: 二号的传奇还在继续积累

translation.en: I don't think many people had kinda seen someone play that way and live that way.
translation.zh: 我不认为有多少人见过有人那样打球 那样生活

translation.en: It's funny too. Johnny coming in, bringing that renegade element to it.
translation.zh: 这也很有趣 强尼加入了带来了叛逆元素

translation.en: It was interesting to see A&M, the old heads, sit back and go,
translation.zh: 这很有趣 看到农工的老家伙们坐在那里说

translation.en: "You know what? We're gonna go with this."
translation.zh: “你知道吗？我们要这么做”

translation.en: At that point, it was like, "This has been fun."
translation.zh: 当时感觉“这很有趣”

translation.en: You know, "The little white kid running around making plays has been fun,
translation.zh: “那个白人小孩跑来跑去打球很有趣

translation.en: but… but welcome to reality. Here comes Alabama."
translation.zh: 但欢迎来到现实 阿拉巴马来了”

translation.en: -[different commentators] -The Cotton Bowl is dominated by Alabama.
translation.zh: 棉花碗由阿拉巴马主宰

translation.en: The Crimson Tide of Alabama is on the flood this New Year's Day.
translation.zh: 阿拉巴马的红潮队新年这一天势不可挡

translation.en: Alabama wins the inaugural Southeastern Conference Championship.
translation.zh: 阿拉巴马赢得了首次东南联盟的冠军

translation.en: Crimson Tide wins the National Championship.
translation.zh: 红潮队赢得了全国冠军

translation.en: Alabama. They win the BCS Championship.
translation.zh: 阿拉巴马 他们赢得了碗冠军赛冠军

translation.en: Fourteen national championships. Man, that's pretty much all you gotta say.
translation.zh: 14次全国冠军你只需要说这句话就够了

translation.en: [Billy] What is it about the Crimson Tide this year,
translation.zh: 今年、去年的红潮有什么特别之处

translation.en: last year, that's made them so good under Nick Saban?
translation.zh: 让他们在尼克·萨班的领导下变得这么好？

translation.en: You mean the last four years?
translation.zh: 你是说过去四年吗？

translation.en: [narrator] Nick Saban is the most dominant head coach in the college football
translation.zh: 尼克·萨班是大学橄榄球队最有统治力的主教练

translation.en: and maybe all of American sports.
translation.zh: 也许是所有美国运动中最有统治力的

translation.en: I remember before the Alabama game, somebody said, "Good luck."
translation.zh: 我记得在阿拉巴马比赛前有人说：“祝你好运”

translation.en: Does A&M have a chance to win this game?
translation.zh: 农工有机会赢吗？

translation.en: [man] A&M has as much chance of beating Alabama -as I do to hit the lottery. -[laughing]
translation.zh: 农工能打败阿拉巴马的机会跟我中彩票一样

translation.en: Kliff saying, "We don't need it. We got Johnny."
translation.zh: 克里夫说：“我们不需要好运我们有强尼”

translation.en: [commentator] A hundred and one thousand will fill this place by the time we kick it off.
translation.zh: 在我们开始比赛的时候10万1千人会填满这个地方

translation.en: [Johnny] Day of the game, I watch the movie 300,
translation.zh: 比赛当天我看了电影《斯巴达300勇士》

translation.en: and I tweet this out before we walk into the stadium,
translation.zh: 在我们走进球场之前我在推特上发了这个

translation.en: And that felt like the perfect spot that we could be in.
translation.zh: 感觉像是我们可以进入的完美地点

translation.en: [Johnny] We have zero expectations to win this game.
translation.zh: 我们对赢这场比赛毫无期待

translation.en: [Johnny] And when you have that "What the fuck? Does it really matter?"
translation.zh: 当你有“这有什么关系？”的态度时

translation.en: attitude, you play better.
translation.zh: 你会发挥更好

translation.en: [commentator] Manziel takes off again.
translation.zh: 曼泽尔又突破拦截

translation.en: [commentator] Uh-oh. Stiff arm.
translation.zh: 呃 僵硬的手臂

translation.en: [Johnny] We came out and scored on our first three drives of the game.
translation.zh: 我们在比赛的前三次控球中得分

translation.en: [commentator] Four-man Alabama rush. Got him.
translation.zh: 四人阿拉巴马突袭 抓到他了

translation.en: Oh no, they didn't.
translation.zh: 没有 他们没有成功

translation.en: -Oh, my gracious. -[commentator 1] Yep.
translation.zh: -我的天啊-对

translation.en: [commentator] How about that?
translation.zh: 怎么样？

translation.en: Boom, score, 14-nothing. Get a stop. Boom, 20-nothing.
translation.zh: 嘭 得分 14比0 停下 嘭 20比0

translation.en: [commentator] A&M has been unstoppable.
translation.zh: 农工势不可挡

translation.en: [Kliff] It was the fastest we've ever started.
translation.zh: 这是我们开始得最快的

translation.en: Johnny was on fire, running, throwing, and that place got quiet really quickly.
translation.zh: 强尼打得非常好 奔跑、投掷那个地方很快就安静了

translation.en: [commentator] Alabama fans are going, "I've never seen anything like this in my life."
translation.zh: 阿拉巴马的粉丝说：“我这辈子都没见过这样的东西”

translation.en: But then, day turns to night. 'Bama comes back.
translation.zh: 但后来天黑了 阿拉巴马又回来了

translation.en: [commentator] Touchdown, Alabama.
translation.zh: 触地得分 阿拉巴马

translation.en: This is a stacked, stacked Alabama offense.
translation.zh: 这是阿拉巴马很棒的进攻

translation.en: [commentator] Lacy left side. Lacy leaning.
translation.zh: 雷西 左边 雷西前倾

translation.en: Lacy's in!
translation.zh: 雷西得分！

translation.en: 'Bama had all the momentum,
translation.zh: 阿拉巴马很有势头

translation.en: and it was looking like you were gonna let one get away.
translation.zh: 看起来你会输掉比赛

translation.en: [commentator] And Manziel knows it. Alabama is still alive.
translation.zh: 曼泽尔也知道 阿拉巴马还活着

translation.en: [Billy] Johnny walks over where I am with some national media people, and he said,
translation.zh: 强尼走到我的位置我身边还有一些国家媒体 他说

translation.en: "Fuck Nick Saban. Fuck Alabama. That's it."
translation.zh: “去死吧 尼克·萨班去死吧 阿拉巴马 就是这样”

translation.en: "We're scoring a touchdown right here. Watch."
translation.zh: “我们要触地得分 你给我看着”

translation.en: [Johnny] Next play is a fake wheel around the sideline,
translation.zh: 下一个战术是边线假轮

translation.en: and I probably throw the best pass I've ever thrown in my life.
translation.zh: 我扔出了我这辈子最棒的一球

translation.en: -[commentator] He's got Swope. -My gosh, what a pass!
translation.zh: -他抓到斯沃普了-天啊 传得太好了！

translation.en: Swope never broke stride.
translation.zh: 斯沃普从来没有打断过进攻

translation.en: Get to the 20, see man coverage.
translation.zh: 到了20码线 看到对方已经包围了

translation.en: I do our check. Malcome Kennedy runs a corner.
translation.zh: 我看了一下我们的人马尔科姆·肯尼迪在角落

translation.en: Wobbly ball, and we score.
translation.zh: 摇晃球 我们得分

translation.en: [commentator] Ball wobbles, it's caught!
translation.zh: 球摇晃了 抓住了！

translation.en: Touchdown!
translation.zh: 触地得分！

translation.en: Malcome Kennedy.
translation.zh: 马尔科姆·肯尼迪

translation.en: Comes running off the sideline, and he's saying, "I fucking told you."
translation.zh: 他从边线跑过来说“我他妈跟你们说了”

translation.en: And the national media guy looks at me and goes, "Dude's a witch."
translation.zh: 全国媒体的那个人看着我说“这家伙会巫术”

translation.en: [shouting] Let's get this over with. Right now! Right now!
translation.zh: 我们把这事搞定 马上！

translation.en: [Billy] Those two plays,
translation.zh: 那两个战术

translation.en: you know, changed Johnny's life.
translation.zh: 你知道 改变了强尼的人生

translation.en: [Johnny] Finally, at the very end, 50 seconds left,
translation.zh: 终于 在最后面 还剩50秒 你在塔斯卡卢萨跪下结束比赛时 赢了比赛

translation.en: you go and you take a knee in Tuscaloosa, and you win the game.
translation.zh: 还剩50秒 你在塔斯卡卢萨跪下结束比赛时 赢了比赛

translation.en: [commentator] A&M did it. They just did it.
translation.zh: 农工成功了 他们就这样胜利了

translation.en: Lightning in a bottle in Tuscaloosa.
translation.zh: 在塔斯卡卢萨艰难取胜

translation.en: [commentator 1] And did Johnny Football put himself in position to be a Heisman Trophy winner?
translation.zh: 强尼·橄榄球有没有让自己有机会获得海斯曼奖杯？

translation.en: You walk off the field like a fucking G.
translation.zh: 你走出球场 感觉自己像个黑帮老大

translation.en: [Johnny] The feeling walking into that locker room after
translation.zh: 比赛之后走进更衣室的感觉

translation.en: was such a joy and a rush for you and your boys.
translation.zh: 很高兴 你和你的队友非常激动

translation.en: To do the undoable, to beat the unbeatable,
translation.zh: 去实现无法做到的事打败不可能打败的队伍

translation.en: and to… [inhales deeply] …really change the course of our history for… forever.
translation.zh: 真的永远改变了我们的历史路径

translation.en: [Johnny] And I didn't know how serious it was until I walked outta the locker room.
translation.zh: 我从更衣室走出来之后才知道这件事有多重大

translation.en: I would always go find my parents.
translation.zh: 我总会去找我的父母

translation.en: I couldn't find 'em.
translation.zh: 我那天找不到他们

translation.en: By the time we got to Johnny,
translation.zh: 我们找到强尼的时候

translation.en: it is a mob.
translation.zh: 一群人聚在一起

translation.en: [Johnny] I gave 'em, like, a two-second hug and immediately wanted to get on the bus.
translation.zh: 我给了他们两秒钟的拥抱就立刻想上车

translation.en: He looked at me, and he had this fear in his eye that I've never seen before.
translation.zh: 他看着我 眼中充满了我从未见过的恐惧

translation.en: [Johnny] When I got on the bus, I was like, "Holy fuck."
translation.zh: 我上车的时候说：“我操”

translation.en: "What is this?"
translation.zh: “这是什么？”

translation.en: I think that's really where my role in… in this begins, for sure.
translation.zh: 我想这肯定就是我在其中角色的开始

translation.en: I mean, I always had a role as a friend, but it becomes a little more defined
translation.zh: 我有一个作为朋友的角色但他在公开场合

translation.en: when he has trouble getting around publicly.
translation.zh: 难以应对时 就会更明确一点

translation.en: [commentator] Johnny Manziel is the talk of the sports world.
translation.zh: 强尼·曼泽尔是体育界的话题

translation.en: [Johnny] It was just pure chaos, 24/7, if you stepped out of the house.
translation.zh: 如果你走出房子就是纯粹的混乱 24小时不间断

translation.en: Look at this T-shirt right here. Supporting Johnny. Look.
translation.zh: 看看这件T恤 支持强尼 看

translation.en: [presenter] Texas A&M is looking to profit from the success of their quarterback.
translation.zh: 德克萨斯州农工大学希望从他们四分卫的成功中获利

translation.en: The team store is selling his jersey for the first time this season.
translation.zh: 球队商店本赛季第一次卖他的运动衫

translation.en: [Johnny] And one thing that came with it was people seeking autographs.
translation.zh: 其中一个后果就是人们要签名

translation.en: And so, Nate turned into, like, a manager for me.
translation.zh: 所以内特变成了我的经纪人

translation.en: Everything went through Nate.
translation.zh: 一切都会经过内特

translation.en: The resources that should've been there for Johnny definitely weren't.
translation.zh: 强尼本来应该有的资源显然没有

translation.en: Had they been, I wouldn't have been part of this picture.
translation.zh: 如果有的话 我也不会参与进去

translation.en: [Kliff] We didn't have the support. We didn't know what to do.
translation.zh: 我们没有支持 我们不知道该怎么办

translation.en: He couldn't go to class because people would just mob him.
translation.zh: 他没办法去上课 因为人们会围上他

translation.en: They had to put him in online classes,
translation.zh: 他们只能给他上网络课程

translation.en: which, for Johnny Football, is not a good idea.
translation.zh: 这对强尼·橄榄球来说不是个好主意

translation.en: [presenter] What makes this story so amazing is that, in the preseason,
translation.zh: 这个故事之所以如此神奇是因为在季前赛

translation.en: hardly anyone knew who Johnny Manziel was.
translation.zh: 几乎没人知道强尼·曼泽尔是谁

translation.en: [female presenter] A young man they call Johnny Football.
translation.zh: 一个他们称为强尼·橄榄球的年轻人

translation.en: -Johnny Football? -Yeah, Johnny Football, Johnny Manziel.
translation.zh: -强尼·橄榄球？-对 强尼·曼泽尔

translation.en: I was dealing with a lot of media requests for Johnny on a national scale,
translation.zh: 我当时处理了很多全国各大媒体对强尼的请求

translation.en: but at the time, Coach Sumlin had a policy:
translation.zh: 但当时萨姆林教练有个规矩

translation.en: "Freshmen do not talk to the media."
translation.zh: 新生不能跟媒体说话

translation.en: [Kliff] It played a huge role in the intrigue and the mystery of what he was
translation.zh: 这大大增强了这个阴谋以及他是什么样的人的神秘感

translation.en: 'cause he never spoke.
translation.zh: 因为他从不讲话

translation.en: So it was like, "Who is this masked man?"
translation.zh: 所以大家说：“这个蒙面人是谁？”

translation.en: -[commentator] Here comes Johnny Football. -There goes Johnny Football.
translation.zh: -强尼·橄榄球来了-强尼·橄榄球来了

translation.en: -[commentator 2] Can you say "magic"? -He's magic.
translation.zh: 你能说“魔法”吗？ 他会魔法

translation.en: And then, you throw on, you know, first year in the SEC,
translation.zh: 包括东南联盟中所有的一年级新生

translation.en: he's unbelievably talented, he's definitely kind of this bad-boy figure.
translation.zh: 他就表现出了难以置信的天赋那种坏男孩的形象

translation.en: My phone was ringing.
translation.zh: 我的手机一直响

translation.en: He was j-- It was… It was unbelievable.
translation.zh: 太不可思议了

translation.en: [presenter] Adidas has actually run out of the blank maroon No 2 jerseys.
translation.zh: 阿迪达斯已经卖完了栗色的空白2号球衣

translation.en: [presenter 1] Manziel's legend grows just as fast.
translation.zh: 曼泽尔的传奇也成长得很快

translation.en: He transcended certainly college football, but also sports.
translation.zh: 他超越了大学橄榄球界的预期也超越了体育的预期

translation.en: [presenter] Sent home from school with a Johnny Manziel carved into the back of his head.
translation.zh: 从学校回家刻了一个强尼·曼泽尔在后脑勺上

translation.en: You know, it just keeps growing, and then, he's a household name.
translation.zh: 这件事一直发酵然后他就是家喻户晓的名字了

translation.en: Welcome into Johnny Manziel and Jim Muncy's world of fantasy football.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到强尼·曼泽尔和吉姆·曼西的幻想橄榄球世界

translation.en: ♪ Johnny Football ♪
translation.zh: 强尼·橄榄球

translation.en: ♪ You're an angel to us ♪
translation.zh: 你是我们的天使

translation.en: [Cannon] We had one week before the Heisman ballots were due,
translation.zh: 我们在海斯曼奖选票到期前还有一周

translation.en: and Johnny did a press conference on campus.
translation.zh: 强尼在校园里开了一个新闻发布会

translation.en: [presenter] All right, ladies and gentlemen,
translation.zh: 女士们先生们 感谢各位今天的到来

translation.en: thank you for coming today. It's my honor and privilege
translation.zh: 女士们先生们 感谢各位今天的到来 这是我的荣誉和荣幸

translation.en: to introduce a young man that's about to turn 20 on December 6th,
translation.zh: 来介绍一个12月6日即将满20岁的年轻人

translation.en: Texas A&M quarterback, Johnny Manziel.
translation.zh: 德州农工四分卫 强尼·曼泽尔

translation.en: -We'll start over here to the right. -[shutters clicking]
translation.zh: 我们从右边这里开始

translation.en: [journalist] Johnny, Pedro Gomez from ESPN.
translation.zh: 强尼 我是来自娱乐体育节目电视网的佩德罗·戈麦斯

translation.en: There's so much talk about a freshman possibly winning the Heisman--
translation.zh: 有很多人在讨论一个大一新生可能赢海斯曼奖…

translation.en: [journalist 1] You're a legend in Kerrville. What advice can you give to all high-school--
translation.zh: 你是克尔维尔的传奇你能给高中的四分卫什么建议…

translation.en: [journalist 2] You're the favorite for Heisman.
translation.zh: 你是最可能赢海斯曼奖的人选

translation.en: People are talking about even two. Does that scare you?
translation.zh: 甚至有人说能得两次这会让你害怕吗？

translation.en: [woman] What is the craziest thing a fan's done for you?
translation.zh: 粉丝为你做过的最疯狂的事是什么？

translation.en: I did see people in Scooby-Doo costumes at the game the other day.
translation.zh: 我前几天在比赛中看到有人穿着史酷比的服装

translation.en: -I'm gonna put that up there at the top. -[journalists laughing]
translation.zh: 所以我要把这件事排到疯狂的第一名

translation.en: The winner of this year's Heisman Trophy will be announced Saturday right here in New York.
translation.zh: 今年海斯曼奖的获得者周六会在纽约这里公布

translation.en: [female presenter] Manziel is considered the favorite.
translation.zh: 曼泽尔被认为是最受喜欢的

translation.en: He'd be the first freshman ever to win the trophy.
translation.zh: 他会是第一个拿到奖杯的大一新生

translation.en: [presenter] The Heisman Trophy will be awarded just a few hours from now,
translation.zh: 海斯曼奖杯将在几小时后颁发

translation.en: and we are honored to be joined by the finalists.
translation.zh: 我们很荣幸能跟入围决赛的在一起

translation.en: This was for all three of you. We got a couple of seniors here and a freshman.
translation.zh: 这个是给你们三个的我们有几个高年级学生和大一新生

translation.en: Does any of that matter anymore when determining the Heisman?
translation.zh: 这些对决定海斯曼奖有什么影响吗？

translation.en: I'd like to hear from all of you on that.
translation.zh: 我想听听你们所有人的看法

translation.en: I don't think so. Um, I think--
translation.zh: 我不这么认为 我觉得…

translation.en: Good evening, everyone. I'm Jim Nantz. We're at the home of the Heisman Trophy,
translation.zh: 大家晚上好 我是吉姆·纳茨我们来到了海斯曼奖杯的故乡

translation.en: the most prestigious prize in all of college sports.
translation.zh: 这是大学运动中最负盛名的奖品

translation.en: [Johnny] You know, I'd watched every Heisman ceremony since I was a kid.
translation.zh: 我从小就看海斯曼奖的所有仪式

translation.en: I remember the Reggie year, the Matt Leinart year,
translation.zh: 我记得雷吉那年 马特·莱纳特那年

translation.en: I remember Cam's, RG3's,
translation.zh: 我记得卡姆的罗伯特·格里芬三世的

translation.en: and one thing that I did know is that a freshman wasn't gonna win the Heisman,
translation.zh: 我知道的一件事就是大一新生不会获奖

translation.en: and there was a huge, huge stigma around that, that it was almost taboo.
translation.zh: 这是个巨大的污点 几乎是禁忌

translation.en: [presenter] Might this be the year the final class barrier is broken down
translation.zh: 也许今年会是选民打破最后阶级障碍的一年

translation.en: by the voters, a first-ever freshman to win the Heisman Trophy?
translation.zh: 也许今年会是选民打破最后阶级障碍的一年 第一次赢得海斯曼奖杯的大一新生？

translation.en: There were three people that were in Heisman contention.
translation.zh: 海斯曼奖入围的有三个人

translation.en: It was really Collin Klein, Manti Te'o, and myself.
translation.zh: 是科林·克莱恩、曼蒂·泰欧和我

translation.en: [female presenter] And to the winner, your name will forever be associated
translation.zh: 获胜者 你的名字会永远

translation.en: with the legacy of being a Heisman Trophy winner.
translation.zh: 和作为海斯曼奖获得者的遗产联系起来

translation.en: [Johnny] I was so unbelievably nervous.
translation.zh: 我当时太紧张了

translation.en: I looked down a lot
translation.zh: 我往下看了好几眼

translation.en: because I felt like my suit jacket was gonna be jumping like this
translation.zh: 因为我感觉我的西服外套要这样飞起来了

translation.en: 'cause I felt like my heart was beating outta my chest.
translation.zh: 因为我感觉我的心脏跳出了胸腔

translation.en: [female presenter] The 2012 winner of the Heisman Memorial Trophy is…
translation.zh: 2012年海斯曼纪念奖杯的得主是…

translation.en: …Johnny Manziel
translation.zh: 强尼·曼泽尔

translation.en: And when my name was called,
translation.zh: 当我的名字被念出来的时候

translation.en: I felt pride, just the most joy I've ever felt in my life.
translation.zh: 我感到骄傲 是我人生中从未有过的最大喜悦

translation.en: [Paul] I was just praying they called his name, and, um…
translation.zh: 我只是祈祷他们叫他的名字 然后…

translation.en: just what a great sound.
translation.zh: 真是个好听的声音

translation.en: It was a great sound. A lot of emotions in there, and, um, you know, a long road of raising him.
translation.zh: 声音很棒 有很多情感你们知道 一路培养他用了很多年

translation.en: To Mom, Dad, Meri, you mean the world to me.
translation.zh: 敬妈妈、爸爸、梅里你们对我而言就是全世界

translation.en: I just wanna thank you for the encouragement, the love, and the patience over the years.
translation.zh: 我想感谢你们多年来的鼓励、爱和耐心

translation.en: [Johnny] It was awesome to see how emotional my dad was
translation.zh: 看到我爸爸有多激动 他为我

translation.en: and just how proud of me he was.
translation.zh: 有多么骄傲 是很棒的事

translation.en: It's been a long time since I've seen him like that,
translation.zh: 我很久没看到他那样了

translation.en: uh, so the impact that's had on me has been tremendous.
translation.zh: 所以对我的影响很大

translation.en: [Paul] As you raise your child, you wanna give him
translation.zh: 当你抚养孩子的时候 你想给他一切机会去他想做的事情

translation.en: every opportunity to get to where he wants to be,
translation.zh: 你想给他一切机会去他想做的事情

translation.en: and, um, he achieved that tonight,
translation.zh: 他今晚做到了

translation.en: and, um, we're not done yet, but, um, he's definitely on his way.
translation.zh: 我们远远没有结束但他肯定已经走上正轨了

translation.en: [Meri] It all changed after the Heisman.
translation.zh: 海斯曼奖之后一切都变了

translation.en: It becomes a little bit larger than football at that point.
translation.zh: 在那个时候 变得比橄榄球更大了

translation.en: Congratulations, Johnny, what are you gonna do with your prize money?
translation.zh: 恭喜 你想拿奖金去做什么？

translation.en: Did they give you money?
translation.zh: 他们给你钱了吗？

translation.en: -I wish. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我希望有-对

translation.en: And then, after the Heisman, people started talking about money.
translation.zh: 然后在海斯曼奖之后人们开始谈论钱

translation.en: What a year it has been.
translation.zh: 多么美好的一年

translation.en: Namely, Texas A&M's first year in the SEC.
translation.zh: 这是德州农工在东南联盟的第一年

translation.en: And not only did Texas A&M compete, we excelled.
translation.zh: 德州农工不仅参与了竞争我们还出类拔萃

translation.en: The nation knows him as Johnny Football,
translation.zh: 全国都知道他叫强尼·橄榄球

translation.en: your 2012 Heisman Trophy winner, Johnny Manziel.
translation.zh: 你们2012年海斯曼奖得主强尼·曼泽尔

translation.en: [all together] Johnny Football, hey, whoo!
translation.zh: 强尼·橄榄球 嘿 喔！

translation.en: I don't know if there's been a more impactful athlete for a university
translation.zh: 我不知道有没有哪个运动员对大学的影响力比强尼·橄榄球

translation.en: than Johnny Football and Texas A&M,
translation.zh: 对德州农工还大

translation.en: and everybody was along for the ride and… and benefiting.
translation.zh: 大家都一路一起 从中受益

translation.en: And that's just a fact.
translation.zh: 这就是事实

translation.en: Whether it's Kevin Sumlin and… and his mega-contract he signed,
translation.zh: 不管是凯文·萨姆林和他签的超大合同

translation.en: Kliff Kingsbury and where his career went,
translation.zh: 还是克里夫·金斯伯里和他职业生涯的发展

translation.en: even our business, like, something that covers Texas A&M.
translation.zh: 甚至是我们的生意报道德州农工的媒体

translation.en: [woman] It certainly is bringing more visitors
translation.zh: 这肯定带来了更多访客

translation.en: and… and more Aggies and more SEC visitors to come in to see our community.
translation.zh: 还有更多农工和东南联盟的访客来看我们的社区

translation.en: We sold out all of the hotels in all of Bryan-College Station.
translation.zh: 我们布莱恩卡城的所有酒店都订满了

translation.en: [Kliff] There was nobody that was looking sideways
translation.zh: 一旦我们开始赢

translation.en: once we started winning and having the run we had.
translation.zh: 并且像我们那样一路赢就没有人怀疑了

translation.en: I mean, everybody knew that they were gonna profit off this run.
translation.zh: 大家都知道他们会从这胜利中获利

translation.en: [Presenter] According to one estimate,
translation.zh: 根据一个估计

translation.en: Manziel's Heisman has been worth $37 million
translation.zh: 曼泽尔的海斯曼奖为德州农工进行的免费宣传

translation.en: in free publicity for Texas A&M.
translation.zh: 价值3700万美元

translation.en: If you don't think it's easier to recruit professors after they see Johnny Manziel,
translation.zh: 如果你不认为教授们看到强尼·曼泽尔后 雇他们更容易

translation.en: then you don't know much about public relations.
translation.zh: 那你就对公关一无所知

translation.en: The people that benefited were the school. Hugely.
translation.zh: 受益的是学校 很巨大

translation.en: The Texas A&M Foundation raised more than $740 million,
translation.zh: 德州农工基金会筹到了超过7.4亿美元

translation.en: $300 million more than any other one-year period in the university's history.
translation.zh: 这比大学历史上任何一年内筹到的都多3亿美元

translation.en: -The donations just skyrocketed. -[rock music playing]
translation.zh: 捐款飙升

translation.en: You know the saying, "Strike while the iron's hot." The iron was never hotter.
translation.zh: 你们也知道“趁热打铁”这种说法铁从来没更热过

translation.en: Because of Johnny's success,
translation.zh: 因为强尼的成功

translation.en: people have a belief that Texas A&M can compete in the SEC.
translation.zh: 人们相信了德州农工可以在东南联盟中竞争

translation.en: So we need to upgrade.
translation.zh: 所以我们需要升级

translation.en: [presenter] A makeover of Texas-sized proportions.
translation.zh: 改造让它与德州大小相称

translation.en: A&M proposed a renovation plan
translation.zh: 农工提出了一个改造计划

translation.en: that could fit more than 100,000 people in Kyle Field.
translation.zh: 可以在凯尔体育场容纳超过10万人

translation.en: [Johnny] There were two times throughout the season
translation.zh: 整个赛季有两次

translation.en: where I had to sign hundreds and hundreds of autographs.
translation.zh: 我要签成百上千个签名

translation.en: We had 'em all lined out for all of our donors.
translation.zh: 给所有捐赠者排好队签名

translation.en: This is where, I guess, I see a little bit behind the scenes,
translation.zh: 我就是在这里看到了一点幕后

translation.en: kind of what they were doing through that year for donations and building a new stadium.
translation.zh: 他们为了捐款和建新球场在那一年都做了什么

translation.en: I was tired of not having any money,
translation.zh: 我厌倦了没钱的日子

translation.en: and I sure as hell saw "45 million No 2 A&M Adidas jerseys sold."
translation.zh: 我很确定看到了“卖出了4500万2号农工阿迪达斯球衣”

translation.en: It didn't make any sense, and…
translation.zh: 没有任何道理

translation.en: …I had a bone to pick. [sighs]
translation.zh: 我需要申诉

translation.en: Football is an industry that makes billions of dollars every year
translation.zh: 橄榄球是一个每年赚几十亿美元的行业

translation.en: at both the pro and collegiate levels.
translation.zh: 无论是专业橄榄球还是大学橄榄球

translation.en: And while professional players can count on fat paychecks,
translation.zh: 虽然职业球员可以依靠丰厚的薪水

translation.en: college athletes can't make a dime.
translation.zh: 而大学运动员一分钱都不赚

translation.en: I have a deep hatred against the NCAA.
translation.zh: 我对全美大学体育协会有很深的恨意

translation.en: Athletes argue the organization continues to profit off student-athletes
translation.zh: 运动员认为组织持续利用学生运动员获利

translation.en: without giving them a fair cut.
translation.zh: 却没有给他们公平分成

translation.en: In 2012, the NCAA was basically, um, set up to make sure
translation.zh: 在2012年 全美大学体育协会成立了

translation.en: there was a level playing field in college football.
translation.zh: 基本是为了确保大学橄榄球领域的公平

translation.en: [presenter] The NCAA president testified that any effort to pay players
translation.zh: 全美大学体育协会主席声明任何付钱给球员的行为

translation.en: would destroy a framework that has been in place for more than a century.
translation.zh: 都会破坏一个已经存在一个多世纪的框架

translation.en: We provide students with access to education,
translation.zh: 我们为学生提供教育机会

translation.en: and there's not even a salary to debate. They're not employees. They're students.
translation.zh: 而且甚至没有薪水可以讨论他们不是员工 他们是学生

translation.en: You're allowed to have a full scholarship, you're allowed to get meals,
translation.zh: 你可以有全额奖学金你可以免费吃饭

translation.en: have your books paid for, classes, housing,
translation.zh: 书籍钱都给你付好了、上课、住房

translation.en: and that was basically it.
translation.zh: 基本就是这样了

translation.en: The idea of athletes being paid,
translation.zh: 运动员得到报酬的想法

translation.en: do you think that will ever happen at the NCAA level?
translation.zh: 你认为那会发生在全美大学体育协会水平吗？

translation.en: Not while I'm president of the NCAA.
translation.zh: 我在任全美大学体育协会主席期间不会

translation.en: There was no marketing deals, there's no advertising deals.
translation.zh: 没有营销协议 没有广告协议

translation.en: You… You couldn't make money off your likeness or image, none of that.
translation.zh: 你不能靠别人的喜欢和形象赚钱 这些都不行

translation.en: He knew everybody was making a ton of money
translation.zh: 他知道每个人都从强尼·橄榄球的狂热中

translation.en: out of Johnny Football mania, so, "Hey! I'm gonna try to get mine."
translation.zh: 赚了一大笔钱 所以“嘿” “我要得到我应得的”

translation.en: [Johnny] It all started at a national championship game in my freshman year.
translation.zh: 一切都是从我大一的全国冠军赛开始的

translation.en: Me and Nate flew down to Miami. I'm sitting there waiting on our bags,
translation.zh: 我和内特飞去了迈阿密我坐在那里等着我们的行李

translation.en: and this guy comes out to me, and he's like, "I've got some money for you if you wanna sign,"
translation.zh: 一个人来找我说“如果你想签名 我有钱给你”

translation.en: and I just kinda blew the guy off a little bit, and he's like,
translation.zh: 然后我有点拒绝了他 他说

translation.en: "Yo, I've got $3,000 for you to sign."
translation.zh: “哟 我有三千美元给你签名”

translation.en: And I remember taking my headphones off and turning around looking at this guy like…
translation.zh: 我记得我摘掉耳机 看着他说

translation.en: [inhales] "Where are we going?"
translation.zh: “我们要去哪里？”

translation.en: They've got liquor. They've got everything to make it fun.
translation.zh: 他们有酒 他们准备好了让这有趣的一切

translation.en: As we're kinda hours into this whole deal, one of the guys is like,
translation.zh: 当我们签了几个小时 其中一个人说

translation.en: "This guy's fucking you over," and slid me a number.
translation.zh: “这个人给你这个价钱是耍你然后塞给了我一个号码”

translation.en: He's like, "Trust me, like, the king of all autographs is downstairs
translation.zh: 他说：“相信我 签名之王在楼下

translation.en: and you guys are getting hosed totally on the count, the money."
translation.zh: 给你这个价钱是占了你便宜”

translation.en: "It's all… It's all screwed. You gotta go downstairs."
translation.zh: “这太黑心了 你要下楼”

translation.en: There was like a black Rolls-Royce Dawn out front.
translation.zh: 门外有一辆黑色的劳斯莱斯黎明

translation.en: He's like, "Hey, hold up," and I look up on the thing, and it was Alex Rodriguez calling.
translation.zh: 他说：“等等” 我抬头看了一眼是阿莱克斯·罗德里格兹打的电话

translation.en: He's like, "Tell this dude I'm good," and I remember him just like, "100%, he's good."
translation.zh: 他说：“告诉这家伙我很好”然后我记得他说“100%他很好”

translation.en: I'm like, "Can't argue with that."
translation.zh: 我说：“确实”

translation.en: [Johnny] "Here's what we're gonna do. I'm gonna get a room at the Fontainebleau."
translation.zh: “我们要这样做我要在枫丹白露开一间房”

translation.en: "I'm gonna set everything up in there."
translation.zh: “我会在里面把一切布置好”

translation.en: "When you get done, shoot me a picture, and I'll give you the code to the safe."
translation.zh: “当你完成后 给我发张照片我会给你保险箱的密码”

translation.en: "Thirty grand."
translation.zh: “三万美金”

translation.en: And once that happened for the first time, it was, like, game on.
translation.zh: 第一次发生的时候就像是游戏开始了

translation.en: Constructing the business was really just logic.
translation.zh: 打造生意真的只是逻辑而已

translation.en: And I hate to even call it a business because it wasn't really a business. It was just, um…
translation.zh: 我甚至讨厌称它为生意因为那不是真的生意 只是…

translation.en: Well, it was a business.
translation.zh: 好吧 这是个生意

translation.en: We were going back once in February, once in March, once in April, once in May.
translation.zh: 我们在二月回来一次三月一次、四月一次、五月一次

translation.en: Business is booming.
translation.zh: 生意很火爆

translation.en: For a 19-year-old kid to have about 100 grand in cash stuffed under your bed,
translation.zh: 对一个19岁的孩子来说床下塞了十万美元现金

translation.en: it was awesome.
translation.zh: 感觉真是太棒了

translation.en: You have to also understand, we weren't just signing autographs.
translation.zh: 你要明白 我们不只是在签名

translation.en: [Johnny] Cabo. California.
translation.zh: 卡沃圣卢卡斯 加州

translation.en: Not looking good for the Padres.
translation.zh: 穿圣地亚哥教士队看起来不太好

translation.en: [Nate] All over the place. Throwing a dart on a map.
translation.zh: 到处都是 在地图上扔飞镖

translation.en: Finish our drinks, go straight to the airport.
translation.zh: 喝完就直接去机场

translation.en: Wake up and we're like, "What are we doing in Washington, DC?"
translation.zh: 醒来后我们会说：“我们要在华盛顿特区做什么？”

translation.en: [commentator] How does a college kid get courtside seats? They are expensive seats.
translation.zh: 一个大学生怎么能在场边坐？那些座位很贵的

translation.en: [Nate] We went to LIV Nightclub, which was big at the time.
translation.zh: 我们去了LIV夜场酒吧 在那时很有名

translation.en: The next thing I know, Rick Ross is just passing us these purple bottles.
translation.zh: 很快 瑞克·罗斯把一些紫色瓶子递给了我们

translation.en: -[crowd cheering] -[woman] He's one of your boys, clearly.
translation.zh: 他显然是你的好朋友之一

translation.en: Johnny's like one of the best guys,
translation.zh: 强尼是最好的人之一

translation.en: and I feel like our friendship will last for… for a very long time.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们的友谊会持续很久

translation.en: [Nate] We went to the Super Bowl, first row, 50-yard line.
translation.zh: 我们去了超级碗 第一排 50码线

translation.en: We went to Maxim Magazine party and had drinks with Jamie Foxx, with Andy Roddick.
translation.zh: 我们去了马克西姆杂志派对跟杰米·福克斯和安迪·罗迪克喝酒

translation.en: Met up with Wale, Justin Timberlake, and Jessica Biel that night.
translation.zh: 那晚遇见了瓦莱、贾斯汀·汀布莱克还有杰西卡·比尔

translation.en: None of them could believe he was there.
translation.zh: 没人能相信他去了

translation.en: I'm going in my head 'cause I'm 20 years old,
translation.zh: 我心里想 因为我才20岁

translation.en: I'm so badass.
translation.zh: “我太厉害了”

translation.en: And I remember… [laughs] …I got this silk Versace shirt,
translation.zh: 我记得我买了一件真丝范思哲衬衫

translation.en: Gucci sunglasses.
translation.zh: 古驰太阳镜

translation.en: And I still, to this day, have the first Gucci wallet that I ever, ever bought.
translation.zh: 直到今天 我依然留着我买的第一个古驰钱包

translation.en: There's still the price tag there.
translation.zh: 里面还有价签

translation.en: So I thought this was, like, the coolest thing in the world.
translation.zh: 我当时觉得这是世界上最酷的东西

translation.en: We make this list of what do we wanna accomplish in our life,
translation.zh: 我们会制作一个我们这辈子要完成的事情清单

translation.en: you know, what do we wanna do?
translation.zh: 我们想做什么？

translation.en: [Nate] He's like, "I don't know. You write yours, and I'll write mine."
translation.zh: 他说：“我不知道你写你的 我写我的”

translation.en: [Johnny] You know, "Make a million dollars, go see this, go see that."
translation.zh: “赚一百万美元去看这个 看那个”

translation.en: All those stupid things you do as a kid, you know, we did together.
translation.zh: 你小时候做的那些愚蠢的事我们都是一起做的

translation.en: [Nate] He's in my ear the whole time telling me we're the baddest thing
translation.zh: 他一直对我说 告诉我 我们是史上最酷的人“让我们继续吧”

translation.en: that ever existed, and "Let's roll."
translation.zh: 告诉我 我们是史上最酷的人“让我们继续吧”

translation.en: "This is what life is like forever."
translation.zh: “人生永远都会这样”

translation.en: And I thought that it was at the time.
translation.zh: 我当时是那样以为的

translation.en: [Johnny] This train was going full speed ahead…
translation.zh: 这列火车在全速前进

translation.en: [inhales] …and it didn't really stop until the NCAA got involved.
translation.zh: 它不会真的停下直到全美大学体育协会介入

translation.en: Texas A&M star quarterback, Johnny Manziel, has come under scrutiny this week.
translation.zh: 德州农工明星四分卫强尼·曼泽尔本周受到了审查

translation.en: Accused of signing sports memorabilia for money.
translation.zh: 被指控签名体育纪念品赚钱

translation.en: I go to my dad, and I was like, "Oh shit," like, "I… I really fucked up."
translation.zh: 我去找我爸我说：“糟了 我犯大错了”

translation.en: Johnny calls me, he says, "Hey, I'm being investigated. What do I do?"
translation.zh: 强尼打给我说：“嘿 我被调查了 我该怎么办？”

translation.en: I said, "Don't say a word. Don't do nothing."
translation.zh: 我说：“什么都别说 别做任何事”

translation.en: Here we go again.
translation.zh: 我们再来一次

translation.en: There may be two other questionable autograph-signing sessions.
translation.zh: 可能还有两个值得怀疑的签名会

translation.en: There's growing concern Johnny Manziel may not even be in uniform…
translation.zh: 人们越来越担心强尼·曼泽尔可能没有穿制服

translation.en: The NCAA had an entire division
translation.zh: 全美大学体育协会有一整个

translation.en: that was dedicated to finding athletes breaking the rules.
translation.zh: 致力于发现违反规则运动员的部门

translation.en: That is no joke.
translation.zh: 这可不是开玩笑的

translation.en: Johnny Football could lose part of his eligibility, if not all.
translation.zh: 强尼·橄榄球可能会失去部分资格也可能失去全部资格

translation.en: Is this the end for Manziel?
translation.zh: 曼泽尔完了吗？

translation.en: But we had already formed an immaculate defense.
translation.zh: 但我们已经形成了完美的辩护

translation.en: We talked, and I devised a plan that was brilliant.
translation.zh: 我们谈过了我设计了一个很棒的计划

translation.en: I started with, "How does he get caught?"
translation.zh: 我开始说：“他怎么会被抓？”

translation.en: He gets caught because somebody takes a picture during a paid autograph session.
translation.zh: 他被抓了是因为有人在带薪签名会上拍照了

translation.en: You can sign autographs all you want.
translation.zh: 你可以随便签名

translation.en: The part you have to conceal is money being paid.
translation.zh: 你必须隐瞒的部分是被付的钱

translation.en: You have all this cash, can't go buy a flight,
translation.zh: 你有这么多现金 不能去买机票

translation.en: so I remember calling my grandpa one day and asking him,
translation.zh: 所以我记得打电话给我爷爷问他

translation.en: "Hey, is there any way that I can, you know, give you some cash,
translation.zh: “嘿 我能不能以某种方式给你一些现金

translation.en: and then you're able to give me a check,
translation.zh: 然后你可以给我一张支票

translation.en: so I'm able to put some money into the bank account?"
translation.zh: 这样我就能把一些钱存进银行账户了？”

translation.en: And my grandpa's a fucking G.
translation.zh: 我爷爷是个很坏的人

translation.en: You know, Nate was very okay with being the fall guy.
translation.zh: 你知道 内特对做替罪羊没意见

translation.en: And with that,
translation.zh: 然后

translation.en: me and Nate split everything 80-20.
translation.zh: 我和内特就按八二分了所有的钱

translation.en: [Nate] The next step is,
translation.zh: 下一步是

translation.en: how are you gonna explain why you are wearing Rolexes
translation.zh: 你要怎么解释你为什么能戴劳力士

translation.en: and driving new cars and flying in private jets?
translation.zh: 开新车 坐私人飞机？

translation.en: As a freshman, you weren't allowed to talk to the media,
translation.zh: 新生不允许跟媒体说话

translation.en: but they were allowed to talk to me.
translation.zh: 但他们可以跟我说话

translation.en: And so the biggest spin that still exists today,
translation.zh: 所以今天还存在的最大偏见

translation.en: I invented a narrative that his family was vastly wealthy.
translation.zh: 我编了一个故事说他的家庭非常富有

translation.en: [Johnny] I've been blessed with family members that have had these opportunities,
translation.zh: 我很幸运有掌握这些机会的家人

translation.en: and I've always been able to do this.
translation.zh: 我向来都有这个能力

translation.en: We sold a little bit of a dream that my family had more money, um, than they actually did.
translation.zh: 我们卖出了一点梦想我的家人比他们实际上有钱

translation.en: What's interesting is here's a kid who doesn't need money.
translation.zh: 有趣的是这里有个不需要钱的孩子

translation.en: He comes from oil money.
translation.zh: 他家是搞石油的

translation.en: A kid who came from oil money.
translation.zh: 一个石油产业家庭的孩子

translation.en: We're not doing anything criminal.
translation.zh: 我们没有做任何犯罪行为

translation.en: We're just not abiding by the NCAA bylaws on which you're not allowed to make money.
translation.zh: 我们只是没遵守全美大学体育协会禁止赚钱的章程

translation.en: Well, Johnny Football suspended for half a game.
translation.zh: 强尼·橄榄球停赛半场

translation.en: The NCAA says there is no evidence that Manziel took money,
translation.zh: 全美大学体育协会说没有证据表明曼泽尔拿钱了

translation.en: but he still violated the rules by signing certain photographs.
translation.zh: 但他签名还是违反了规定

translation.en: They, um, penalized him half a game
translation.zh: 他们因为没能阻止对他的名字进行商业化

translation.en: for failure to prevent the commercialization of his name.
translation.zh: 罚了他停赛半场

translation.en: And we went right back to signing autographs.
translation.zh: 然后我们又回去签名了

translation.en: The last time the reigning Heisman Trophy winner returned to play in the SEC
translation.zh: 上次统治的海斯曼奖杯获得者回到东南联盟比赛

translation.en: was Tim Tebow back in 2007.
translation.zh: 还是2007年的蒂姆·蒂博

translation.en: Now, it's this man's turn.
translation.zh: 现在轮到这个人了

translation.en: [presenter] The one person that everybody had their eyes on earlier this morning
translation.zh: 今早获得万众瞩目的一个人

translation.en: was Johnny Football.
translation.zh: 是强尼·橄榄球

translation.en: Once he won the Heisman,
translation.zh: 一旦他赢了海斯曼奖

translation.en: I saw a different side of him.
translation.zh: 我就看到了他的另一面

translation.en: It was like there was nothing stopping him from doing what he wanted to do.
translation.zh: 好像没有什么能阻止他做他想做的事

translation.en: [Johnny] What was going on with the NCAA,
translation.zh: 全美大学体育协会的情况

translation.en: for years and years and years, was just wrong,
translation.zh: 持续了这么多年 那是不对的

translation.en: and I went into that suspension pissed,
translation.zh: 我对被停赛很生气

translation.en: but also with the biggest smirk on my face ever.
translation.zh: 但我脸上还是有最大的笑容

translation.en: And then, from then on out, everything I really did
translation.zh: 从那以后 我做的一切

translation.en: just got absolutely nitpicked and torn apart.
translation.zh: 就完全被挑剔、被拆解

translation.en: People saying, "He's traveling around the world,
translation.zh: 人们说：“他环游了世界

translation.en: he's done Jay Leno, he hasn't been at practice very much."
translation.zh: 他出现在了杰·雷诺的节目上没有做什么训练”

translation.en: Fuck your practice. I'm the best player in the country.
translation.zh: 去你的训练吧 我是全国最好的球员

translation.en: [presenter] Manziel caught a lot of heat from the media after leaving the Manning Passing Academy.
translation.zh: 曼泽尔离开曼宁学院后媒体揪着他不放

translation.en: Some reports say Manziel was hungover and missed camp.
translation.zh: 有些报道说曼泽尔宿醉错过了夏令营

translation.en: [journalist] What happened on the weekend?
translation.zh: 周末发生了什么事？

translation.en: Um, nothing… nothing more than I overslept.
translation.zh: 只是我睡过头了而已

translation.en: I was a shark in a fish tank,
translation.zh: 我是在鱼缸里的鲨鱼

translation.en: and I didn't really feel like I had any way to move.
translation.zh: 我感觉自己没有办法活动了

translation.en: [presenter] Early Sunday morning, Manziel posted a quote,
translation.zh: 星期天一早 曼泽尔发了贴 “今晚的这种破事就是我迫不及待离开卡城的原因

translation.en: [woman] Manziel was reportedly quickly and harshly removed from a frat party.
translation.zh: 据报道曼泽尔被快速、粗暴地移出兄弟会派对

translation.en: [Johnny] I like to have fun in my life.
translation.zh: 我喜欢在我的生活中拥有乐趣

translation.en: I like to live my life to the fullest, and if that upsets some people, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我喜欢过上最充实的生活如果那让某些人失落了 我很抱歉

translation.en: What Johnny needed was to be held accountable.
translation.zh: 强尼需要的是承担责任

translation.en: When you turn your son over to a coach and to a program,
translation.zh: 当你把你儿子交给教练和项目的时候

translation.en: they're supposed to not only teach him how to play football,
translation.zh: 他们应该不仅仅教他如何打球

translation.en: they're responsible to turn him into a good young man.
translation.zh: 他们有责任他变成一个良好的年轻人

translation.en: [Kliff] I always felt you had to be careful
translation.zh: 我一直觉得你要小心

translation.en: on trying to tell Johnny how to live his life.
translation.zh: 告诉强尼如何过他的人生

translation.en: Wasn't ideal I think, for us as coaches,
translation.zh: 我觉得对我们教练来说不理想

translation.en: but it was kinda like, that's the dark side he needed to play good,
translation.zh: 但有点像是他球场好好表现所需要的黑暗面

translation.en: and as long as he wasn't getting in trouble, um,
translation.zh: 只要他没惹上麻烦

translation.en: do your deal.
translation.zh: 就去做你想做的

translation.en: [Kevin] Um, nobody's really ever been in this situation.
translation.zh: 从来没有人真的遇到过这种情况

translation.en: We've been very clear with Johnny and his family about the dos and don'ts,
translation.zh: 我们跟强尼和他家人说得很清楚可以做什么 不能做什么

translation.en: but, um, there's not a perfect person in this room.
translation.zh: 但这个房间里没有完美的人

translation.en: [Paul] For the school, how do you take him out and waste a season?
translation.zh: 为了学校 你怎么把他剔除浪费一个赛季？

translation.en: How do you do that, financially or anything else?
translation.zh: 你要怎么做不管是经济上的考虑还是其他？

translation.en: Y… You don't.
translation.zh: 你没办法

translation.en: [presenter] So the suspension
translation.zh: 所以停赛

translation.en: that many around college football felt was just a joke is now history,
translation.zh: 大学橄榄球队的很多人觉得这只是个笑话 现在是历史了

translation.en: and Johnny Manziel is a college football player again.
translation.zh: 强尼·曼泽尔又是大学橄榄球员了

translation.en: [crowd cheering] Johnny! Johnny! Johnny! Johnny!
translation.zh: 强尼！

translation.en: [commentator] In for his first snap of 2013.
translation.zh: 进行他在2013年的第一次开球

translation.en: And Manziel takes off.
translation.zh: 曼泽尔突破重围

translation.en: There goes Johnny Football!
translation.zh: 强尼·橄榄球来了！

translation.en: That's why they love him here in College Station.
translation.zh: 所以在卡城 他们才这么爱他

translation.en: Here's his other standard move after a touchdown.
translation.zh: 这是他触地得分后的另一个标准动作

translation.en: All this money thing that he started doing,
translation.zh: 他开始做的那些搞钱的手势

translation.en: I didn't like it, but people begged for that.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢 但人们求他那样做

translation.en: [woman shouting] Show me the money, baby!
translation.zh: 让我赚大钱 宝贝！

translation.en: [presenter] This season started with enormous expectations for Johnny Manziel.
translation.zh: 这一季开始时对强尼·曼泽尔的期望很高

translation.en: Perhaps his second Heisman Trophy, SEC National Championship.
translation.zh: 也许是第二次海斯曼奖杯东南联盟全国冠军

translation.en: [commentator] Third of the half for Johnny Football.
translation.zh: 强尼·橄榄球上半场的第三个触地得分

translation.en: Following the touchdown, unsportsmanlike conduct,
translation.zh: 在触地得分之后违反体育道德的行为

translation.en: No 2 of the offense, 15-yard penalty…
translation.zh: 二号犯规 15码罚球…

translation.en: There were people trying to put discipline on me.
translation.zh: 有人想让我守规矩

translation.en: [Kevin] That's not okay, and obviously, I addressed that
translation.zh: 那可不行 显然我战术结束时

translation.en: on the sideline right after the play.
translation.zh: 在边线就强调了

translation.en: [Johnny] But at the same time,
translation.zh: 但同时

translation.en: nobody knew how to handle everything that was going on.
translation.zh: 没人知道该怎么处理发生的一切

translation.en: There is a code of conduct for the reigning Heisman winner,
translation.zh: 海斯曼奖的获得者有一个行为准则

translation.en: and he violated it once again.
translation.zh: 他又一次违反了

translation.en: He's hanging out with Drake and LeBron, and he's coming home…

translation.en: At that point, you were like… Didn't matter.

translation.en: so I think he's just being himself.
translation.zh: 所以他只是在做自己

translation.en: and I recreate even a smidgen of that success,

translation.en: I'm gonna have millions of dollars and be the first quarterback taken in the draft.

translation.zh: 前海斯曼得主最大的问题

translation.en: is whether he should head to the pros while his draft stock is looking so bright.
translation.zh: 是他是否该走进职业橄榄球 而他作为运动员的价值看起来很有前途

translation.en: [Johnny] I bitched out on workouts

translation.en: and felt like I didn't have to do what everybody else was doing,

translation.en: and that whole idea and mantra I had in my head from Kerrville of,
