translation.en: "You're gonna dress the same way, do the same thing as the guy next to you,"
translation.zh: “你要穿得一样做跟旁边的人一样的事”

translation.en: was completely eliminated in six months' time.
translation.zh: 在六个月后就彻底消失不见了

translation.en: [commentator] Got a feeling Johnny Manziel's a little frustrated.
translation.zh: 我觉得强尼·曼泽尔有点沮丧

translation.en: [Paul] I think all of the expectation, the partying, the NCAA stuff,
translation.zh: 我觉得所有的期待、参加派对 全美大学体育协会那些事各种农工的事 所有那些压力

translation.en: all the A&M, all the pressure,
translation.zh: 全美大学体育协会那些事各种农工的事 所有那些压力

translation.en: I think it changed him.
translation.zh: 我觉得那些改变了他

translation.en: [commentator] There's a reaction on the sidelines from A&M's leader, Johnny Manziel.
translation.zh: 边线那边农工队长强尼·曼泽尔有反应

translation.en: [Kevin] The thing that makes him who he is, is his passion and emotion.
translation.zh: 让他成为他自己的是他的热情和情感

translation.en: It's our challenge to try to keep that energy positive.
translation.zh: 保持正能量是我们的挑战

translation.en: [presenter] Johnny Manziel just can't help himself.
translation.zh: 强尼·曼泽尔就是无法控制自己

translation.en: You draw the line in the sand, he steps over that line.
translation.zh: 你在沙子里画线 他就会越过那条线

translation.en: [man] Let's remember this. This problem did not happen last year.
translation.zh: 让我们记住去年没有发生过这个问题

translation.en: [shouting] Turn the fuck up!
translation.zh: 嗨起来！

translation.en: Last week was one
translation.zh: 上周是

translation.en: of his most disappointing games since he's been at Texas A&M.
translation.zh: 他来农工之后最令人失望的一场比赛

translation.en: [presenter] And the ovation for Johnny Manziel
translation.zh: 凯尔体育场的门关闭同时我们听到了

translation.en: along with these seniors as they close the door on Kyle Field.
translation.zh: 给强尼·曼泽尔和这些高年级学生们的喝彩

translation.en: [Johnny] There's no reason the team we had should be eight and four that year.
translation.zh: 那年我们的队伍不应该八赢四输

translation.en: We were better than that.
translation.zh: 我们没那么差

translation.en: But it didn't matter
translation.zh: 但这不重要

translation.en: 'cause you're looking at mock drafts and you're looking forward and…
translation.zh: 因为你在看模拟运动员选拔你在向前看

translation.en: whether people like to say it or not, I was bigger than College Station.
translation.zh: 不管人们愿不愿意说我的水平远远超越了卡城这个小池塘

translation.en: So it was just kinda time to move on and go do the next thing.
translation.zh: 所以是时候离开 开始做下一件事了

translation.en: Johnny Manziel made it official today, no surprise,
translation.zh: 曼泽尔今天正式宣布了 毫无意外

translation.en: announcing he's gonna leave college to enter the NFL draft.
translation.zh: 宣布他要离开大学加入国家橄榄球联盟选拔

translation.en: [presenter] The big question, "Where will Manziel go in the draft?"
translation.zh: 重要的问题是曼泽尔会被选成排名多少？

translation.en: I think I was considered a very risky person, um, for him
translation.zh: 我觉得我被认为是对他非常危险的人

translation.en: 'cause I knew everything.
translation.zh: 因为我什么都知道

translation.en: And so I think that the counsel he was receiving at the time
translation.zh: 所以我认为他在那时候收到的法律忠告

translation.en: was probably sound advice, which is like,
translation.zh: 可能是周到的建议 建议说

translation.en: "Hey, you're no longer doing this half-ass, 20-year-old management."
translation.zh: “嘿 你不能再搞这个门外汉20岁的管理了”

translation.en: I… I just knew I was super loyal,
translation.zh: 我知道我非常忠诚

translation.en: and that I contributed everything, mind, body, soul, spirit, to help him,
translation.zh: 我为了帮助他付出了一切思想、身体、灵魂、精神

translation.en: erm, and an image needed to change from being best friend
translation.zh: 形象也需要从好朋友转变成

translation.en: to it needed to be a big firm.
translation.zh: 做一个大公司

translation.en: [Johnny] We'd originally told him that there wasn't gonna be a guy with me in the day-to-day,
translation.zh: 我们本来就告诉他不会有人和我每天在一起帮我

translation.en: and when we told him that wasn't gonna happen,
translation.zh: 当我们告诉他不会那样的时候

translation.en: I kinda think, like, he felt his role and the whole role was diminished,
translation.zh: 我觉得他觉得自己的角色整体的角色削弱了

translation.en: and kinda pulled away.
translation.zh: 然后就离开了

translation.en: [inhales] And I don't think we've spoken again since then.
translation.zh: 从那之后我们好像就没再聊过了

translation.en: You know, for me, this is what we'd talked about flying on those planes to South Beach.
translation.zh: 对我来说 我们说的是坐飞机去南海滩

translation.en: You know, this is what we talked about at the Fontainebleau sitting by the pool.
translation.zh: 我们说的是在枫丹白露 坐在泳池边

translation.en: So, you know, I felt terrible about it, but at the same time,
translation.zh: 所以你知道 我觉得很愧疚 但同时

translation.en: because of what my track record was, they weren't gonna allow me to do that.
translation.zh: 因为我的历史记录他们不允许我这样做了

translation.en: And Nate being away was probably a safeguard for a while.
translation.zh: 内特离开可能是暂时的保护措施

translation.en: [Nate] I didn't care about the business side of it.
translation.zh: 我不在乎商业方面的东西

translation.en: Truly, I didn't.
translation.zh: 真的

translation.en: The only thing I was hurting about was that I loved Johnny.
translation.zh: 我唯一受伤的地方是 我爱强尼

translation.en: He was my best friend.
translation.zh: 他是我最好的朋友

translation.en: I was, um… unbelievably loyal to my guys.
translation.zh: 我…对我的人忠心耿耿

translation.en: U… Until you really can't be anymore.
translation.zh: 直到你真的不能再忠心了

translation.en: Yeah, I'm Erik Burkhardt.
translation.zh: 对 我是艾瑞克·伯克哈特

translation.en: Um, I was Johnny's sports agent for way too many years.
translation.zh: 是强尼很多年的体育经纪人

translation.en: So it's such a big deal,
translation.zh: 所以这很重要

translation.en: especially for a quarterback, if they can go in the first round,
translation.zh: 尤其是对四分卫来说如果他们能成功进入最好的行列

translation.en: because if he goes top five, we're talking 20 to 25 million.
translation.zh: 因为如果他进了前五收入能有两千万到2500万美元

translation.en: And every pick in the first round, the money starts falloff about a million dollars.
translation.zh: 最强选手中的排名每下落一位收入就会少大概100万美元

translation.en: So many people had been making millions of dollars
translation.zh: 这么多人靠强强尼和他的队友

translation.en: on the back of Johnny and his teammates, largely after that Heisman year.
translation.zh: 在海斯曼奖那年之后赚了数百万美元

translation.en: He earned this contract, which was still gonna be peanuts
translation.zh: 他赢得了这份合同 但和那么多

translation.en: compared to what so many other people had made on his back the whole time.
translation.zh: 一直靠他赚钱的人赚的数量相比还是非常少的钱

translation.en: I was real. I didn't come in saying, "You're gonna go top ten."
translation.zh: 我对他非常坦诚我没有说“你会进入前十名”

translation.en: I came and I go, "You're not going in the first round."
translation.zh: 我说：“你不会排在前面”

translation.en: He does not belong in the top 25.
translation.zh: 他不属于前25名

translation.en: He may get a bump to second round. He's not getting in the first round.
translation.zh: 他可能会进入第二梯队进不去第一梯队

translation.en: The big questions on Johnny were gonna be, "Do you really wanna be a quarterback,
translation.zh: 强尼身上的大问题是“你想成为一个四分卫

translation.en: or do you wanna be famous?" 'Cause he was super famous already.
translation.zh: 还是你想出名？”因为他已经非常出名了

translation.en: There's things Johnny's gotta answer moving forward
translation.zh: 强尼日后的发展以后做四分卫 做队长

translation.en: to be a quarterback and be a leader.
translation.zh: 有些问题需要回答

translation.en: We can leave no doubt. For somebody to take your fucked-up ass in the first round,
translation.zh: 我们可以毫无疑问要让一个人进入第一梯队

translation.en: here's what this strategy needs to look like.
translation.zh: 我们的策略应该是这样的

translation.en: [Johnny] I'm going straight to San Diego and I'm getting right into this pre-draft training.
translation.zh: 我要直接去圣地亚哥直接进入选拔前的训练

translation.en: Come right back.
translation.zh: 马上回来

translation.en: [Erik] So, number one: We're doing no PR.
translation.zh: 第一 我们不做公关

translation.en: The only thing coming outta your socials is you sweating and working your ass off.
translation.zh: 你的社交网站上唯一能出现的就是你满头大汗、拼命锻炼

translation.en: You need to gain some weight, learn the game, no drinking,
translation.zh: 你需要增加一些体重学习比赛、不能喝酒

translation.en: and when you show up at the NFL Combine in two months,
translation.zh: 当你在两个月后出现在国家橄榄球联盟综合考察营时候

translation.en: now they're really gonna start considering you.
translation.zh: 他们现在才要开始考虑你

translation.en: You know, 6:30, 7:00 in the morning until seven, eight o'clock at night,
translation.zh: 早上6:30 7:00到晚上七、八点

translation.en: and you just do it on repeat over and over and over again.
translation.zh: 你就一遍又一遍地重复

translation.en: [Erik] We're gonna go crazy and do a record-setting Nike deal through LeBron's team,
translation.zh: 我们要疯狂一些 通过勒布朗的团队创造耐克合约记录

translation.en: but we're gonna do those in silence.
translation.zh: 但我们不会公开搞

translation.en: I was drug testing him every other week
translation.zh: 我每两周就给他来一次药检

translation.en: 'cause I know that's gonna come up, and I wanna be able to go,
translation.zh: 因为我知道这一天会到来我希望到时候能够说

translation.en: "Here's 25 drug tests. I've been testing him."
translation.zh: “这是25种药检 我一直在测试他”

translation.en: "'Cause when I signed him, I didn't know what I was dealing with,
translation.zh: “因为我签他的时候不知道自己面对的是什么

translation.en: but I wanted you to have peace of mind."
translation.zh: 但我想让你有这个意识”

translation.en: You need to own who you were and what you've done.
translation.zh: 你需要承认自己的过去和所作所为

translation.en: I was like, "We're gonna embrace who you were
translation.zh: 比如说：“我们要拥抱过去的你

translation.en: and say, 'Okay, but now it's time to go be a pro, and I'm gonna grow up.'"
translation.zh: 然后说‘好 但现在是时候成为职业选手了 我要长大’”

translation.en: And that was my expectation that he actually would.
translation.zh: 这是我对他的期望

translation.en: I was really, really good until the week before the combine in Indy,
translation.zh: 直到印第安纳波利斯考察营之前的一周 我始终很好

translation.en: and I finally just broke.
translation.zh: 我终于崩溃了

translation.en: He calls me, and he's like,
translation.zh: 他打给我说

translation.en: "EB, I fucked up."
translation.zh: “艾瑞克 我搞砸了”

translation.en: [tsks] Like, "How bad?"
translation.zh: 我说：“有多糟？”

translation.en: I didn't remember much of the night.
translation.zh: 我不记得那晚的多数事情了

translation.en: I woke up in a hotel room, and didn't know how I got there.
translation.zh: 在酒店房间醒来不知道我是怎么到那里的

translation.en: "Dude, I went to a party last night in the Hills."
translation.zh: “我昨晚在好莱坞山参加了派对”

translation.en: He's like, "Man, everyone was there. Man, all the rappers, all the actresses."
translation.zh: 他说：“天啊 所有人都在场所有说唱歌手、所有女演员”

translation.en: I mean, I didn't know, going into Indy, if I was really gonna be able
translation.zh: 我不知道进入印第安纳波利斯 我是否真的能通过药检

translation.en: to pass a drug test.
translation.zh: 我是否真的能通过药检

translation.en: He's clean the whole time before that.
translation.zh: 他在那之前始终是没问题的

translation.en: The only thing I've ever been told was, "Fail a drug test at the combine,
translation.zh: 我唯一被告知的一件事是：“如果在考察营没通过药检

translation.en: and you're gonna go from first-round pick to maybe undrafted."
translation.zh: 你会从选入第一梯队到可能落选”

translation.en: They're gonna drug test you day two here.
translation.zh: 他们会在第二天给你做药检

translation.en: He's like, "EB, I've been watching the NFL combine."
translation.zh: 他说：“艾瑞克 我一直在看国家橄榄球联盟考察营”

translation.en: "I'm coming to the combine."
translation.zh: “我要去考察营”

translation.en: I say, "No, you're not." There… We're not risking this, so we compromise.
translation.zh: 我说：“不 你不能去”我们不会冒这个险 所以我们妥协

translation.en: I call Paul and Michelle. I'm like, "Okay,
translation.zh: 我给保罗和米歇尔打电话我说：“好吧

translation.en: you are checking yourself in the hospital, Paul, with, like, fucking heavy heart,
translation.zh: 你去住院 保罗说你心脏出现了严重的问题

translation.en: so that Johnny can divert and come to the combine for 12 hours,
translation.zh: 这样强尼就可以分心在考察营待12个小时

translation.en: so that it doesn't look weird,
translation.zh: 这样才不会看起来很奇怪

translation.en: and put him on a plane down to see Dad who's in the hospital."
translation.zh: 把他送上飞机去医院看爸爸”

translation.en: "I'm so sorry, but we'll reschedule these interviews."
translation.zh: “抱歉 我们会重新安排采访时间”

translation.en: That was my strategy, and Paul's like, "Okay, Michelle, you're going,"
translation.zh: 那是我的策略 保罗说：“好的 米歇尔 你去住院”

translation.en: and, like, she's crying, "I knew he would do this."
translation.zh: 然后她在哭：“我就知道他会这样”

translation.en: I'm like, "Fuck."
translation.zh: 我说：“操”

translation.en: He's like, "I don't even get there till tomorrow, bro."
translation.zh: 他说：“我明天才能到”

translation.en: "I'm gonna chug a gallon of fucking water. "I'll piss this shit out. Trust me."
translation.zh: “我会喝一加仑的水”“我会把这东西尿出去 相信我”

translation.en: He goes, "I… I've been passing these tests at A&M for a while,"
translation.zh: 他说：“我在农工通过这些检测有很长一段时间了

translation.en: which I come to find out on my own
translation.zh: 那是我后来自己发现的

translation.en: it was their, like, fourth-string backup quarterback
translation.zh: 那是他们的第四名替补四分卫

translation.en: -that was pissing for him at A&M. -[smirks]
translation.zh: 帮他撒尿 在农工做的药检

translation.en: -So how's the day been? -It's been really good.
translation.zh: -今天过得怎么样？-非常好

translation.en: A little early morning, but we're kinda in the mood now, in the swing of things.
translation.zh: 有点早 但我们现在有享受这些的心情

translation.en: I get, like, three gallons of water, a bunch of Pedialyte,
translation.zh: 我弄了11升水 一堆电解质水

translation.en: and four drug tests.
translation.zh: 四个药检

translation.en: There's, like, six hotels at the combine. So every team's, like, staying at these same hotels.
translation.zh: 考察营有六家酒店每个团队都住在同样的六家酒店

translation.en: We get on the elevator, and up… Comes on.
translation.zh: 我们上了电梯 然后… 有人挤进来了

translation.en: Two general managers and a college scouting director get on the elevator.
translation.zh: 两位总经理和一名球探主管上来了

translation.en: I'm holding the drug tests, like, trying to hide them.
translation.zh: 我手里拿着药检 努力把它们藏起来

translation.en: We go to my room.
translation.zh: 我们去了我的房间

translation.en: We're, like, holding his piss up in the bathroom of my hotel room,
translation.zh: 我们在我酒店房间的浴室里高举着他的尿

translation.en: and it's, like… it's a little ambiguous.
translation.zh: 有点模糊

translation.en: Johnny's just crushing liquids.
translation.zh: 强尼就在灌液体

translation.en: We take our second one. It's a little lighter.
translation.zh: 我们做了第二个 稍微轻一点

translation.en: So he's like, "Ha ha ha! We got this shit."
translation.zh: 他说：“我们搞定了”

translation.en: I was like, "Keep drinking."
translation.zh: 我说：“继续喝”

translation.en: What was that process like?
translation.zh: 那个过程什么样？

translation.en: It was really cool to see… to see a bunch of these coaches I've seen on TV and…
translation.zh: 很高兴看到我在电视上看到的一群教练

translation.en: By the way, he of course crushed his interviews.
translation.zh: 顺便说一句 他的采访做得很好

translation.en: In fact, rave reviews out of the combine on how great he did.
translation.zh: 事实上 媒体都在评价在考察营他表现得有多好

translation.en: And that was a very, very, um, scary thing,
translation.zh: 那是非常可怕的事

translation.en: one that I think snapped me out of it for a little bit,
translation.zh: 我觉得这让我有点害怕

translation.en: and then once I got through that unscathed, um…
translation.zh: 然后一旦我安全地通过了…

translation.en: you know, kinda let loose a little bit more.
translation.zh: 你知道 我就稍微放松了一点

translation.en: [presenter] It was a pro day done the Johnny Manziel way.
translation.zh: 那是强尼·曼泽尔方式度过的职业日

translation.en: [Erik] The next step is pro day where he's gonna do the on-the-field.
translation.zh: 下一步是职业日 他会在球场进行

translation.en: I go to multiple pro days every year, there will never be another like this.
translation.zh: 我每年都去参加几次职业日从来没有像这个一样的

translation.en: [presenter] A huge crowd at College Station.
translation.zh: 卡城有一大群人

translation.en: George and Barbara Bush even showing up.
translation.zh: 连乔治·布什和老婆都去了

translation.en: Manziel's performance receiving universal praise.
translation.zh: 曼泽尔的表现获得了全世界的赞誉

translation.en: Our strategy's working. The buzz is like, "He could go."
translation.zh: 我们的策略奏效了大家都说“他可以进了”

translation.en: [woman] Most experts agree he's gonna be a top-ten pick.
translation.zh: 大多数专家都认为他会选入前十名

translation.en: [man] He'll be a top-ten pick.
translation.zh: 他会选入前十名

translation.en: At that point, our strategy was just throw his ass in a cave, lock him up.
translation.zh: 当时我们的策略是把他扔进山洞 把他关起来

translation.en: After I got through my pro day, I felt like a majority of the work had been done.
translation.zh: 在我度过职业日之后我感觉大部分的工作已经完成了

translation.en: Will the Houston Texans pick Johnny Manziel first?
translation.zh: 休斯顿德州人队会先选强尼·曼泽尔吗？

translation.en: Houston, number-one pick.
translation.zh: 休斯顿 第一个选的

translation.en: The buzz is building in the city.
translation.zh: 这座城市正在沸腾

translation.en: [presenter] All around Houston, billboards are up to bring Johnny Football back to Texas.
translation.zh: 休斯顿周围到处立起了广告牌要把强尼·橄榄球带回德州

translation.en: He got involved with a big charity foundation event.
translation.zh: 参与了一个大型慈善基金会活动

translation.en: The owner was gonna be there with his wife.
translation.zh: 老板要和他妻子一起去

translation.en: Johnny ends up, like, donating his own money to the cause.
translation.zh: 强尼最后把自己的钱捐给了这项事业

translation.en: It goes phenomenal.
translation.zh: 这很非凡

translation.en: The next day, I get a call.
translation.zh: 第二天我接到一个电话

translation.en: "He was golfing today at River Oaks Country Club,"
translation.zh: “他今天在奥克斯河乡村俱乐部打了高尔夫”

translation.en: and it got back to the owner's family, basically, that Johnny, by hole five,
translation.zh: 消息传回了主人的家族说强尼在第五洞旁边

translation.en: had taken his shirt off, "looked intoxicated,"
translation.zh: 脱掉他的衬衫 “看起来喝醉了”

translation.en: and broke multiple clubs over his knee and threw 'em in the pond.
translation.zh: 他用膝盖折断了几个球杆扔到了池塘里

translation.en: There goes Houston.
translation.zh: 休斯顿的机会就这样没了

translation.en: It's Weekend at Bernie's. It's just like, how can we get him to the finish line?
translation.zh: 这是《老板度假去》就是我们怎么能把他带到终点线？

translation.en: The wheels are coming off. I'm talking to him every day.
translation.zh: 突然失败 我每天都跟他说

translation.en: "Stay accountable. You've worked your whole life. We got one month to go."
translation.zh: “负起责任 你努力了一辈子我们还剩一个月了”

translation.en: People are talking first pick overall or a top ten.
translation.zh: 大家都在聊会是整体第一还是前十名

translation.en: The story that just sums up the whole thing,
translation.zh: 这个故事总结了整件事

translation.en: the night before his private workout with the Browns…
translation.zh: 在他和布朗进行私人训练的前一晚…

translation.en: [Erik] They all fly in.
translation.zh: 他们都飞过来了

translation.en: They're gonna do dinner with him in College Station
translation.zh: 他们会在卡城和他吃晚餐

translation.en: with a private workout the next morning.
translation.zh: 然后第二天早上和他一起做私人训练

translation.en: Dinner goes awesome.
translation.zh: 晚餐进行很顺利

translation.en: So we go up to our rooms…
translation.zh: 所以我们上楼回到房间…

translation.en: [Billy] I miss about five calls from him.
translation.zh: 我没接到他的大概五个电话

translation.en: I go over there, and it's a shit show.
translation.zh: 我去了那边 真是个可怕的情境

translation.en: Bottles of 1942 everywhere.
translation.zh: 到处都是龙舌兰的瓶子

translation.en: He's drinking straight outta the wine bottles.
translation.zh: 他用酒瓶直接喝的

translation.en: So the next day, one of the receivers is missing.
translation.zh: 所以第二天 有一个接球手不见了

translation.en: This other receiver's drunk, can't get up.
translation.zh: 另一个接球手喝醉了 起不来了

translation.en: So the Browns walk in the facility, he's warming up,
translation.zh: 所以布朗走进场地 他在热身

translation.en: they look over, they're like, "Where's the receivers?"
translation.zh: 他们看过来说：“接球手呢？”

translation.en: And Johnny goes, "Ah, we're good."
translation.zh: 强尼说：“啊 我们很好”

translation.en: You know who catches passes for him?
translation.zh: 你知道谁帮他接的球吗？

translation.en: His lawyer,
translation.zh: 他的律师

translation.en: his agent…
translation.zh: 他的经纪人…

translation.en: The first route, it's like, "Okay, let's run a slant." I'm like…
translation.zh: 第一条路线就是“我们跑个传球路线” 我就这样…

translation.en: Like I'm in high school, bros. This is ridiculous.
translation.zh: 像高中时那样 兄弟 这太荒谬了

translation.en: I call him, like, "How'd it go?"
translation.zh: 我打给他说：“怎么样？”

translation.en: He said, "I fucking killed it."
translation.zh: 他说：“我做得太棒了”

translation.en: [broadcaster] Welcome indeed to New York City, to Radio City Music Hall
translation.zh: 欢迎来到纽约市来到无线电城音乐厅

translation.en: where, tonight, we find out where Johnny Manziel will be playing…
translation.zh: 今晚我们会揭晓强尼·曼泽尔要去哪里打球…

translation.en: There's cameras in our face around our table the entire time.
translation.zh: 我们桌子周围一直有摄像头对着我们的脸拍

translation.en: From the minute we walk in, it's like the Johnny Manziel Show.
translation.zh: 我们一走进来整个就是强尼·曼泽尔的节目

translation.en: "Where's he going?" And we have no idea.
translation.zh: “他要去哪里？” 我们不知道

translation.en: With the first pick in the 2014 NFL draft,
translation.zh: 2014年国家橄榄球联盟选拔的首选

translation.en: the Houston Texans select Jadeveon Clowney.
translation.zh: 休斯顿德州人选择杰德温·库洛尼

translation.en: [Erik] Then you had the Jacksonville Jaguars at three.
translation.zh: 然后杰克逊维尔美洲虎第三

translation.en: I had on good authority. They were ready to take a franchise quarterback.
translation.zh: 我有可靠的依据他们准备拿下球队的四分卫了

translation.en: The Jacksonville Jaguars select Blake Bortles.
translation.zh: 杰克逊维尔美洲虎队选择布雷克·博特斯

translation.en: [broadcaster] The first quarterback of this draft selected is not Johnny Manziel.
translation.zh: 选出的第一位四分卫不是强尼·曼泽尔

translation.en: Bortles goes three, and Johnny's like, "Fuck, yes! I'm going to Dallas."
translation.zh: 博特斯第三个 强尼说“好 我要去达拉斯了”

translation.en: [broadcaster] What happens when Jerry Jones gets the chance to take Johnny Football?
translation.zh: 如果杰瑞·琼斯有机会选强尼·橄榄球的话 会发生什么？

translation.en: [Johnny] I really thought the floor would probably be Dallas at 16.
translation.zh: 我真的以为最低会是达拉斯的第16

translation.en: They wait the whole clock.
translation.zh: 他们等了很久

translation.en: [broadcaster] If they take Johnny Manziel right now, this place is gonna explode.
translation.zh: 如果他们现在选强尼·曼泽尔这里会爆炸的

translation.en: The Dallas Cowboys select
translation.zh: 达拉斯牛仔队选

translation.en: Zack Martin, guard, Notre Dame.
translation.zh: 扎克·马丁 防守 圣母大学橄榄球队

translation.en: We're sitting at the draft table, and he's just going down the draft.
translation.zh: 我们坐在选台上他在选拔中不断往后排

translation.en: A lot of teams did their homework.
translation.zh: 很多队伍都做了认真的调查

translation.en: [broadcaster] Snubbed by team after team after team after team.
translation.zh: 被一个接一个的队伍冷落

translation.en: [Johnny] I was nervous about it. You can see it on my face on draft night.
translation.zh: 我当时很紧张选拔之夜可以在我脸上看到

translation.en: I think you can see it in a lot of people around me.
translation.zh: 我觉得可以在我身边的很多人脸上看到

translation.en: Like, if I don't get picked in the first round, I'll probably disappear, run off the face of the earth.
translation.zh: 如果我第一轮不被选上我要找个地洞钻进去了

translation.en: And I remember being horrified. Like, my career's on the line right now too.
translation.zh: 我记得我被吓坏了我的事业现在也有危机了

translation.en: So at that point, I'm, like, texting Cleveland, "Come back in, bro. Trust me."
translation.zh: 所以那时 我给克利夫兰发短信：“回来吧 兄弟 相信我”

translation.en: -Browns at 26 just moved up to 22. -[crowd] Johnny!
translation.zh: -26位的布朗上升到22-强尼！

translation.en: And you can hear the chant in the Radio City Music Hall for Johnny.
translation.zh: 你可以听到无线电城音乐厅为强尼唱起圣歌

translation.en: [man laughing mockingly] Ha ha ha!
translation.zh: （选拔派对 俄亥俄 克利夫兰）

translation.en: With the 22nd pick,
translation.zh: 第22位选择

translation.en: the Cleveland Browns select
translation.zh: 克利夫兰布朗队选择

translation.en: Johnny Manziel,
translation.zh: 强尼·曼泽尔

translation.en: quarterback, Texas A&M.
translation.zh: 四分卫 德州农工队

translation.en: [broadcaster] My goodness.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: [Erik] That moment was unbelievable.
translation.zh: 那一刻简直难以置信

translation.en: [broadcaster] Right there, is the hope for the city of Cleveland.
translation.zh: 那就是克利夫兰市的希望

translation.en: [Erik] As down as it felt… It felt like we were in there for three days.
translation.zh: 虽然感觉很糟糕… 感觉我们在里面待了三天

translation.en: He walks across that stage, and does the Money Manziel.
translation.zh: 他走过那个舞台做了曼泽尔钱的动作

translation.en: [Erik] Holy shit.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: He went in the first round.
translation.zh: 他进入了第一梯队

translation.en: It all works out.
translation.zh: 一切顺利

translation.en: [broadcaster] The Browns finally get the face of their franchise.
translation.zh: 布朗队终于有了他们球队的门面

translation.en: [Erik] I was like, "We're gonna make it."
translation.zh: 我心里想：“我们会成功的”

translation.en: "He's gonna be the savior. They're gonna build statues of this guy."
translation.zh: “他会成为救世主的他们会建造这个人的雕像”

translation.en: And then, I'll never forget, we leave the draft,
translation.zh: 然后我永远不会忘记我们离开了选拔

translation.en: we're at this light and the sunroof's open
translation.zh: 我们在一个信号灯 开着天窗

translation.en: and Johnny's like, crushing shots of whatever in this limo with his family and friends,
translation.zh: 强尼在这辆豪华轿车里和家人朋友喝酒

translation.en: and we look up
translation.zh: 然后我们向上看

translation.en: and it was the first Nike ad on the side of this building in New York,
translation.zh: 那是纽约一栋楼的第一个耐克广告

translation.en: and I was like, "Wow."
translation.zh: 我心里想：“哇”

translation.en: "Let's go."
translation.zh: “我们腾飞吧”

translation.en: [woman] Well, the news is Johnny Manziel is having a ripple effect across Browns Nation.
translation.zh: 强尼·曼泽尔在布朗队网站产生了连锁反应的消息

translation.en: -[people shouting] Johnny! -[man] Whoa!
translation.zh: 强尼！

translation.en: [Johnny] You know, the people around me that I had, um, were genuinely very, very excited.
translation.zh: 我身边的人真的很兴奋

translation.en: You know, they thought this was a great opportunity for me to come in
translation.zh: 他们认为这是个很好的机会让我加入

translation.en: and to revitalize a franchise that had been struggling for a long time.
translation.zh: 在球队长期挣扎后振作起来

translation.en: You know, every day that passes, every week that goes by is… is only a positive thing for me.
translation.zh: 过去的每一天 每一周对我来说都是好事

translation.en: There was so much pressure on him and expectations,
translation.zh: 他的压力很大 对他的期望很高

translation.en: and you could tell he was struggling.
translation.zh: 可以看出来 他很挣扎

translation.en: [Johnny] Didn't take me very long to be in Cleveland
translation.zh: 我在克利夫兰没多久

translation.en: to find out that I wasn't gonna be happy there.
translation.zh: 就发现我在那里不会快乐

translation.en: I had every single thing that I could've ever wanted.
translation.zh: 我拥有了我曾经想要的一切

translation.en: You have money, you have fame,
translation.zh: 有钱 有名气

translation.en: you're a first-round draft pick battling for a starting quarterback position,
translation.zh: 你是选拔第一轮被选的新人四分卫

translation.en: and when I got everything that I wanted,
translation.zh: 当我得到了我想要的一切时

translation.en: I think I was the most empty that I've ever felt inside.
translation.zh: 我感觉我是内心最空虚的人

translation.en: [Johnny] You know, I'd always had a great time in the locker room with my guys
translation.zh: 你知道 我以前在更衣室里和我的兄弟们总是很快乐

translation.en: and the practice and the camaraderie and everything that comes along with it,
translation.zh: 还有训练、友情和随之而来的一切

translation.en: but I never felt that way in the NFL.
translation.zh: 但我在国家橄榄球联盟从来没有这种感受

translation.en: What it takes to be the face of franchise each and every day,
translation.zh: 每天都要做职业运动队的门面那不适合他

translation.en: that's just not who he is, and he never put that much into it.
translation.zh: 每天都要做职业运动队的门面那不适合他 他从来没在这方面投入太多

translation.en: If he wanted to do it, his skill set and how good he is as a player,
translation.zh: 如果他想做 他的技术和他作为橄榄球运动员的优秀

translation.en: he could've done it. He never worked at it.
translation.zh: 他能做到 但他从来没努力过

translation.en: [Erik] I started seeing signs pretty early on in Cleveland.
translation.zh: 我很早就开始在克利夫兰看到迹象了

translation.en: The one thing for me was he always loved the game,
translation.zh: 我看到的一件事是他始终热爱比赛

translation.en: and he'd call me after practice, like, "I don't… Man, it's not fun anymore."
translation.zh: 他会在训练后打电话给我“兄弟 这不再好玩了”

translation.en: Their GM's calling me going, "He doesn't watch tape."
translation.zh: 他们的总经理给我打电话说“他不看录像分析”

translation.en: I'm like, "Well, he's gotta watch some tape."
translation.zh: 我说：“他总会看一些录像啊”

translation.en: He's like, "EB, his iPad hours is 0.00."
translation.zh: 他说：“艾瑞克 他的平板电脑显示使用时长是零”

translation.en: Zero.
translation.zh: 零

translation.en: I would sit in my condo in Cleveland downtown
translation.zh: 我会坐在克利夫兰市的公寓中

translation.en: and just feel like it was the only place that I could get away from everybody and anything.
translation.zh: 我感觉那里是我唯一能远离所有人和事的地方

translation.en: And I would look out those windows every day and I just felt empty.
translation.zh: 我每天都看着窗外 我感到空虚

translation.en: I went from one fishbowl city to another, and I wanted nothing to do with football.
translation.zh: 我从一个小鱼缸城搬到了另一个小鱼缸城 我不想再打橄榄球了

translation.en: I wanted nothing to do with stepping on that field.
translation.zh: 我不想踏进那个球场

translation.en: And I had bigger issues in my life
translation.zh: 我的人生中有比能够上场

translation.en: than being able to go out and play free-spirited, flowing football.
translation.zh: 自由投掷橄榄球更大的问题

translation.en: I had gone from the whirlwind ride of 2012 in College Station,
translation.zh: 我从2012年的卡城

translation.en: the Heisman Trophy, the Cotton Bowl, the NCAA investigation,
translation.zh: 海斯曼奖、棉花碗全美大学体育协会调查

translation.en: straight into another season, into the NFL draft.
translation.zh: 到另一个赛季 到国家橄榄球联盟选拔 一路叱咤风云

translation.en: I just didn't get a break.
translation.zh: 我没有机会休息

translation.en: [Johnny] It's been life for so long now.
translation.zh: 我已经忙于生计太久了

translation.en: I can't really think back to the days of how it was
translation.zh: 我无法回想过去以前没有人推特发我

translation.en: when I didn't have people tweeting or taking pictures of wherever I was.
translation.zh: 不会无论在什么地方都有人拍照那种日子是怎样的

translation.en: [Johnny] I truly almost see those times in black and white.
translation.zh: 我真的几乎看到那些日子是黑白色的

translation.en: And I didn't know why I couldn't see sunny days.
translation.zh: 我不知道为什么我看不到阳光

translation.en: [commentator] …Manziel, and Manziel is buried.
translation.zh: …曼泽尔 曼泽尔被埋没了

translation.en: And there's your first cash sign.
translation.zh: 我们看到了第一个搞钱手势

translation.en: This thing of the, you know, show me the money.
translation.zh: 所以这个手势 让我赚大钱

translation.en: Every time they sack him, the defensemen do that right in his face.
translation.zh: 每次他们擒杀他的时候防守队员就在他面前那么做

translation.en: He had a terrible start in the NFL.
translation.zh: 他在国家橄榄球联盟的开局很糟糕

translation.en: [presenter] It was horrific…
translation.zh: 太可怕了

translation.en: [presenter 1] Nothing like the Johnny Football we saw at Texas A&M.
translation.zh: 跟我们在德州农工看到的强尼·橄榄球完全没有可比性

translation.en: I'm supposed to be the savior. [inhales] You know, I'm just looking for a good day.
translation.zh: 我应该是救世主我只是想要状态好的日子

translation.en: In the back of my head all the time,
translation.zh: 我的脑中一直有这样的想法

translation.en: I was telling myself, "You do not wanna fuckin' be here."
translation.zh: 我告诉自己“你根本不想在这里”

translation.en: And "Do what you need to do to get out."
translation.zh: “做你离开这里需要做的事”

translation.en: [presenter] Stories surfaced about him being late for team meetings.
translation.zh: 听说他队伍会议迟到了

translation.en: He was demoted to third-string quarterback.
translation.zh: 他被降级为三线四分卫

translation.en: A high-price, first-round draft pick heading in the wrong direction.
translation.zh: 高价的第一轮选拔的人在朝着错误的方向发展

translation.en: Yeah, I…
translation.zh: 对 我…

translation.en: You know, I made the decision to go out on Friday night.
translation.zh: 你知道 我决定周五晚上出走

translation.en: I think I was trying to suppress how I felt,
translation.zh: 我想我是在压抑自己的感受

translation.en: and get out of being Johnny Football.
translation.zh: 想逃出成为强尼·橄榄球

translation.en: When he turned pro, the partying became more public.
translation.zh: 他成为职业选手后参加派对变得更加公开

translation.en: -I can't hear. -He can't hear you.
translation.zh: -我听不见-他听不见你说话

translation.en: There's too much money… in my… hand.
translation.zh: 我手上的钱太多了

translation.en: Nothing that I'm doing on the weekends is affecting my job.
translation.zh: 我周末做的任何事都不会影响我的工作

translation.en: Nothing on the weekends that I'm doing, um, is hopefully hurting any of my teammates in my locker room.
translation.zh: 我周末做的任何事都无意伤害我的队友

translation.en: [Paul] So he kinda just said, "Fuck it. I just got $8.5 million,
translation.zh: 所以他就说：“去死吧” “我刚拿到了850万美元

translation.en: so I'll just go do what I want."
translation.zh: 所以我要去做想做的事”

translation.en: People around me always told me, like, "You're doing this on purpose."
translation.zh: 我身边的人总是跟我说“你这样做是故意的”

translation.en: Now, in my conscious mind, that didn't make sense to me.
translation.zh: 在我的意识里 这对我来说不合理

translation.en: He just keeps putting himself in situations where he's getting himself in trouble.
translation.zh: 他总是让自己陷入麻烦

translation.en: That guy knows that he represents more than himself
translation.zh: 那家伙知道他代表的不知是自己

translation.en: and has issues off the field.
translation.zh: 在场外有很多问题

translation.en: It's… It is frustrating.
translation.zh: 太令人沮丧了

translation.en: I wanted to get him help. We all knew he was self-destructing.
translation.zh: 我想找人帮他我们都知道他在自我摧毁

translation.en: [Erik] It was like he stopped caring.
translation.zh: 他好像不再关心了

translation.en: And I was like, "Okay, we gotta do rehab."
translation.zh: 好像在说：“好吧 我们要去戒毒所”

translation.en: [female presenter] Johnny Football, the big bust of a rookie last year,
translation.zh: 强尼·橄榄球 去年新人的大失败

translation.en: entered a treatment program on Wednesday.
translation.zh: 周三进入了治疗项目

translation.en: It was hard the first couple days,
translation.zh: 最开始几天很辛苦

translation.en: obviously being a guy that's on every single TV.
translation.zh: 显然我是每个电视都在播的男人

translation.en: He's been somewhat of a legend, and perhaps to his own peril here.
translation.zh: 他曾经是个传奇人物也许这对他自己也有风险

translation.en: [Johnny] I did have people trying to figure out which treatment center I was at,
translation.zh: 确实有人想知道我在哪个治疗中心

translation.en: and I remember walking down the hill one day
translation.zh: 我记得有一天下山

translation.en: and seeing this rental car drive right past us,
translation.zh: 看到一辆共享汽车经过我们

translation.en: and it was Jeremy Fowler from ESPN, and I just…
translation.zh: 是娱乐体育节目电视网的杰里米·福勒 我就…

translation.en: It threw me for a loop whenever that happened.
translation.zh: 这件事发生的时候让我很震惊

translation.en: [female presenter] When he returned to the team after ten weeks of rehab,
translation.zh: 当他在戒毒十周后回到球队时

translation.en: he looked and sounded like a changed man.
translation.zh: 他看起来、听起来都像变了个人

translation.en: I'm gonna say "Loser in life." Can't get out of it.
translation.zh: 我要说是人生中的失败者 无法自拔

translation.en: The hype and everything is a little bit tempered and a little down,
translation.zh: 炒作之类的有点缓和了热度有点下去了

translation.en: and that, for me, is a good thing.
translation.zh: 这对我来说是件好事

translation.en: Got out of rehab. He was doing awesome. He was focused.
translation.zh: 从戒毒所出去 他做得很好 他很专注

translation.en: He started playing, and you could just gradually see,
translation.zh: 他开始比赛了 你可以慢慢看到

translation.en: once he started being around other influences, here we go again.
translation.zh: 他一旦身边开始有其他的影响我们就又这样了

translation.en: When you take one step onto a slippery slope,
translation.zh: 当你踏上湿滑坡道的第一步

translation.en: you know, it goes pretty quick.
translation.zh: 你知道 这会很快

translation.en: Remember, he went to rehab, not supposed to drink.
translation.zh: 记住 他去过戒毒所 不应该喝酒的

translation.en: Drank, got into a fight with his girlfriend.
translation.zh: 喝醉了 跟女朋友吵架了

translation.en: [broadcaster] Both Manziel and the woman told police they had been drinking.
translation.zh: 曼泽尔和那个女人都告诉警察他们一直在喝酒

translation.en: No charges were filed.
translation.zh: 没有提起任何诉状

translation.en: And after that, it started to spiral a little bit more and more and more.
translation.zh: 在那之后 就开始变得越来越急转直下

translation.en: I thought I would go to Vegas on a Saturday afternoon
translation.zh: 我以为我会在周六下午去维加斯

translation.en: and I would turn around and come back and be in time for the game the next day.
translation.zh: 然后转身回来 第二天准时比赛

translation.en: [presenter] It sounded a little cuckoo,
translation.zh: 听起来有点疯狂

translation.en: but he had the wig on, there was a fake mustache involved.
translation.zh: 但他戴上了假发 贴了假胡子

translation.en: [Johnny] I sit down at a blackjack table,
translation.zh: 我坐在二十一牌桌上

translation.en: and I can start to see people, you know, looking at me a little bit.
translation.zh: 我可以开始看到有人看着我

translation.en: This is when the Twitter shitstorm absolutely hits the fan.
translation.zh: 这就是推特灾难爆炸的时候

translation.en: I don't know anything about getting a plane to leave Vegas
translation.zh: 我不知道怎么弄一架飞机离开拉斯维加斯

translation.en: to go back to Cleveland. I'm looking at commercial flights.
translation.zh: 回到克利夫兰 我就看商业航班

translation.en: I missed the last one at 10:30, and at this point, I'm like,
translation.zh: 错过了10:30的最后一班 当时我就想

translation.en: "Well, let's fucking rip it tonight."
translation.zh: “好吧 我们今晚来个派对吧”

translation.en: I completely detached from all of it.
translation.zh: 我完全脱离了一切

translation.en: Johnny Football is now looking for another team this morning.
translation.zh: 强尼·橄榄球今早在找另一支球队

translation.en: The Cleveland Browns cutting ties with Johnny Manziel and his bad-boy behavior.
translation.zh: 克利夫兰布朗队在和强尼·曼泽尔以及他的坏男孩行为切断关系

translation.en: [presenter] There is no future for Johnny Manziel with the Cleveland Browns,
translation.zh: 强尼·曼泽尔在克利夫兰布朗队没有未来了

translation.en: certainly not anymore, as the Browns have finally realized.
translation.zh: 肯定已经不行了 布朗终于意识到了

translation.en: Manziel is not reachable.
translation.zh: 曼泽尔联系不上

translation.en: [Paul] It was just…
translation.zh: 真是…

translation.en: It was disastrous. It was… It was the fall.
translation.zh: 灾难性的 大垮台

translation.en: [presenter] One of the biggest busts in NFL history.
translation.zh: 这是国家橄榄球联盟历史上最大的一次打击

translation.en: "Tiny," "selfish," "undisciplined," "immature," "sort of a brat."
translation.zh: “小”、“自私”、“不守规矩”“不成熟”、“混小子”

translation.en: [presenter 1] Johnny Manziel arrived as the future of Cleveland football,
translation.zh: 强尼·曼泽尔来到这里的时候是克利夫兰橄榄球的未来

translation.en: and now he will soon leave as an embarrassment.
translation.zh: 现在他很快就会丢人地离开了

translation.en: [Johnny] When I got cut from the Browns,
translation.zh: 当我被布朗放弃

translation.en: I felt like the biggest weight lifted off my shoulders ever.
translation.zh: 我感觉肩上最大的重担被拿掉了

translation.en: But that didn't translate into what I experienced
translation.zh: 但那并没有体现在我所经历的

translation.en: and what I… [inhales deeply] …would deal with in my everyday life.
translation.zh: 和我每天要处理的事情上

translation.en: [news reporter] Dallas police say they are examining hotel surveillance video
translation.zh: 达拉斯警方说他们正在检查酒店监控录像

translation.en: showing an encounter between Manziel and his ex-girlfriend, Colleen Crowley.
translation.zh: 展示了曼泽尔和前女友科琳·克劳利相遇的场景

translation.en: Crowley said Manziel led her down a back stairway,
translation.zh: 克劳利说曼泽尔带她下了后面的楼梯

translation.en: and that she told the valet,
translation.zh: 她告诉酒店服务人员

translation.en: "Please don't let him take me. I'm scared for my life."
translation.zh: “拜托别让他带走我我害怕自己的生命有危险”

translation.en: [Johnny] Throughout that relationship, I was unfaithful
translation.zh: 在这段关系中 我不忠诚

translation.en: and, you know, we get into a heated, heated argument.
translation.zh: 我们陷入了激烈的争吵

translation.en: You know, she's trying to jump out of the car, and, um…
translation.zh: 你知道 她想跳下车 然后…

translation.en: Colleen Crowley has obtained a protective order from a judge in Texas
translation.zh: 科琳·克劳利获得了一个德州法官开的保护令

translation.en: that will keep Johnny Manziel away from her for two years.
translation.zh: 那会让强尼·曼泽尔远离她两年

translation.en: It was so out of control,
translation.zh: 太失控了

translation.en: but he couldn't hear it.
translation.zh: 但他听不进去

translation.en: His mind was so gone. I mean, he was just…
translation.zh: 他的思想消失了 我是说 他就…

translation.en: Did you apologize for what happened?
translation.zh: 你为发生的事道歉了吗？

translation.en: What about rehab, Johnny? Gonna go to rehab?
translation.zh: 戒毒所呢？要去戒毒所吗？

translation.en: We tried to get him in another rehab.
translation.zh: 我们想让他去另一个戒毒所

translation.en: Took him, you… you know.
translation.zh: 带走了他

translation.en: He escapes.
translation.zh: 他逃跑了

translation.en: [man] Friends and family are concerned. Everything going well?
translation.zh: 朋友和家人都很担心 一切都好吗？

translation.en: My friends and family are all right. They're with me.
translation.zh: 我的朋友和家人都很好 他们支持我

translation.en: [Paul] My relationship with Johnny was very strained.
translation.zh: 我和强尼的关系非常紧张

translation.en: "I've done everything I can for ya. You're not listening."
translation.zh: “我已经为你尽力了 你不听”

translation.en: "You're self-destructing. You're disrespectful."
translation.zh: “你在自我摧毁 你太不尊重人了”

translation.en: Pretty much "Go fuck yourself. Go… You know more than I do, so go ahead."
translation.zh: 基本就是“去你的你比我知道得多 所以你去吧”

translation.en: [female presenter] His dad says Manziel refused rehab twice in the past week.
translation.zh: 他父亲说曼泽尔上周两次拒绝去戒毒所

translation.en: I said, "If you miss one counseling session, I will have to literally terminate you,"
translation.zh: 我说：“如果你不去心理医生咨询我就要跟你终止合同了”

translation.en: which doesn't happen in agent business, much less to Johnny Football.
translation.zh: 这在经纪人行业没发生过更不要说强尼·橄榄球了

translation.en: [female presenter] Even his agent, Erik Burkhardt, is dumping Manziel.
translation.zh: 就连他的经纪人埃艾瑞克·伯克哈特也在抛弃曼泽尔

translation.en: [Johnny] I got released as a client of my uncle, who was doing my attorney work.
translation.zh: 我被我叔叔踢出了客户名单他做我律师的工作

translation.en: My dad withdrew his name from my company,
translation.zh: 我爸爸从我的公司里撤销了他的名字

translation.en: and the people around me, closest to me,
translation.zh: 还有我身边最亲近的人

translation.en: were in the mindset of, "We have to let him go."
translation.zh: 当时的心态是：“我们必须让他走”

translation.en: And, you know, when that happened,
translation.zh: 你知道 发生那件事的时候

translation.en: it was full-blown "I'm gonna rub this whole thing in your fucking face."
translation.zh: 完全是“我要用这件事羞辱你”

translation.en: "You think you've seen something now? You haven't seen shit yet."
translation.zh: “你们觉得看到什么了吗？你们还没见过更厉害的”

translation.en: [Johnny] You know, the first point in my life where I really ramped up my drug use
translation.zh: 你知道 我人生中第一次增加吸毒量

translation.en: to a constant, daily thing.
translation.zh: 持续吸 每天都吸

translation.en: -[man] Johnny, got anything you wanna say? -[man 1] Johnny Football. How's it going?
translation.zh: -强尼 你有什么想说的吗？-怎么样？

translation.en: [Johnny] I was mostly doing a lot of coke and taking Oxys.
translation.zh: 我主要是吸很多可卡因还有奥施康定

translation.en: I went from 215 pounds in January to 175 pounds by September.
translation.zh: 我从1月的98公斤 瘦到9月的79公斤

translation.en: The wires in my head seemed very twisted.
translation.zh: 我脑子里的弦好像很扭曲

translation.en: I got diagnosed as bipolar,
translation.zh: 我被诊断出双相障碍

translation.en: and I felt like it was the same as being called an alcoholic or a drug addict.
translation.zh: 我觉得这跟被叫酒鬼和瘾君子是一样的

translation.en: [presenter] The money and the fame and the criticism and the social media
translation.zh: 钱、名声、批评和社交媒体

translation.en: it is eating him alive.
translation.zh: 在吞噬他

translation.en: [Johnny] I think I was just running from problems.
translation.zh: 我觉得我当时只是在逃避问题

translation.en: Probably a f… five-million-dollar bender.
translation.zh: 大概是五百万美金的饮酒作乐

translation.en: [Johnny] Direct self-sabotage, trying to burn this thing down.
translation.zh: 直接自我破坏试图毁掉他的事业和人生

translation.en: I had planned to do everything that I wanted to do
translation.zh: 我在人生的这个时候

translation.en: at that point in my life.
translation.zh: 本来计划做一切我想做的事

translation.en: Spend as much money as I possibly could, and then my plan was to take my life.
translation.zh: 尽可能多花钱 然后我的计划是自杀

translation.en: [Johnny] You know, I… Months prior, went and bought a gun
translation.zh: 我几个月前 我去买了一支枪

translation.en: that I knew I was gonna use.
translation.zh: 我知道我会用到

translation.en: [Johnny] I wanted it to get as bad as humanly possible to where it made sense,
translation.zh: 我想把这件事弄到人类最坏的可能性让这一切合理

translation.en: and it made it seem like an excuse and an out for me.
translation.zh: 让它看起来对我而言是个借口和出路

translation.en: Still, to this day, I don't know what happened,
translation.zh: 虽然直到今天我还是不知道发生了什么

translation.en: but the gun just clicked on me.
translation.zh: 但那把枪没射我

translation.en: I couldn't fix what I'd done
translation.zh: 我无法改变我做过的事情

translation.en: with Colleen, with the NFL, with A&M, everything.
translation.zh: 对科琳、国家橄榄球联盟农工做的一切

translation.en: You know, at that point in time, I didn't have much of a relationship with my family.
translation.zh: 那时 我和我的家人关系也不太密切

translation.en: The ride was over.
translation.zh: 狂饮作乐结束了

translation.en: [Johnny] I left LA not knowing where I was gonna go, um,
translation.zh: 我离开了洛杉矶不知道自己要去哪里

translation.en: not knowing what was gonna happen, and I went back to Texas,
translation.zh: 不知道会发生什么 我就回德州了

translation.en: and, you know, I didn't really say a whole lot to my dad,
translation.zh: 我没跟我爸说太多

translation.en: just kinda showed up at the front door
translation.zh: 直接出现在前门

translation.en: and pretty much saying, "I don't have anywhere else to turn, man."
translation.zh: 然后说：“我没有其他地方可以去”

translation.en: -[birds chirping] -[Johnny whistles] Come on.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: [breathes in] Come here.
translation.zh: 过来

translation.en: -Come here. -[Paul chuckles]
translation.zh: 过来

translation.en: I took him yesterday and he was runnin', runnin' wild on the golf course.
translation.zh: 我昨天带着他他在高尔夫球场上狂奔

translation.en: -I'll send you a video. -You should take him every day.
translation.zh: -给你发了一段视频-应该每天都带着他

translation.en: He doesn't wanna stay in the house, I know that.
translation.zh: 他不想待在家里

translation.en: [Paul] It's been a long, long road, and it's been…
translation.zh: 这条路很长 这…

translation.en: I don't know if it's been great
translation.zh: 我不知道这段路很好

translation.en: or if it's been bad.
translation.zh: 还是很糟

translation.en: That's kinda still up for debate.
translation.zh: 这还有待商榷

translation.en: [Paul] Come up the hill.
translation.zh: 上山

translation.en: [Johnny] All right. I'll drive down the first one.
translation.zh: 我从第一个开下去

translation.en: [Paul] But we're blessed, and he's still with us.
translation.zh: 但我们很幸运 他还在我们身边

translation.en: [grunts softly] Yeah.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: [Paul] And we can mend all the fences still.
translation.zh: 我们还能修复所有的关系

translation.en: [Johnny] Hey, you hit one good out of three.
translation.zh: 你三个里打了一个好的

translation.en: But I think Johnny's got a lot better days coming
translation.zh: 但我觉得强尼以后的日子

translation.en: than what he's had.
translation.zh: 会比以前好很多

translation.en: [Meri] A lot of people wonder, you know, why isn't he doing anything?
translation.zh: 很多人都在想 你知道他为什么什么都不做？

translation.en: He's not in a place mentally
translation.zh: 他现在精神上不适合

translation.en: to go out and do something right now.
translation.zh: 出门做事

translation.en: I know how much good he can do in this world,
translation.zh: 我知道他可以在这个世界做多少好事

translation.en: but I know the struggle he goes through every single day of his life.
translation.zh: 但我知道他生命的每一天经历的挣扎

translation.en: And it's never gonna go away.
translation.zh: 而这永远不会消失

translation.en: [Johnny] I think people do maybe worry about me sometimes,
translation.zh: 我觉得人们可能有时会担心我

translation.en: but, I mean, that… that's natural.
translation.zh: 但我觉得那是很自然的

translation.en: You know, I've given them reason to do that.
translation.zh: 你知道 他们这样做很合理

translation.en: I didn't go into Texas A&M thinking I was gonna play two years
translation.zh: 我去德州农工的时候没想到我会在那里打两年球

translation.en: and end up in the NFL draft.
translation.zh: 最后进入国家橄榄球联盟选拔

translation.en: You know, I thought if I ever got to play football in college,
translation.zh: 你知道 我以前觉得如果我有机会在大学打橄榄球

translation.en: that would be an unbelievable accomplishment for me.
translation.zh: 那会是对我而言难以置信的成就

translation.en: And I tell people all the time, it wouldn't have mattered where I was at, um, what team.
translation.zh: 我一直告诉别人 我在哪里在什么队伍都没关系

translation.en: Wherever it was, at that point in time in my life,
translation.zh: 当时不管在哪里

translation.en: I was incapable of being a good NFL quarterback.
translation.zh: 我都做不好一个国家橄榄球联盟的四分卫

translation.en: [Johnny] You know, when you get to that point, you're supposed to fuckin' know better.
translation.zh: 当你到了那个地步 你就该更清楚

translation.en: Supposed to know what to do, behave like a pro.
translation.zh: 知道该做什么 表现得像个职业球员

translation.en: You're supposed to push your career forward,
translation.zh: 你应该发展你的事业

translation.en: your athleticism forward, you know, your strive for being a great athlete.
translation.zh: 发展你的运动能力发展你要成为一个伟大运动员的动力

translation.en: [Johnny] But when it came down to it, you know, I was a frat boy,
translation.zh: 但落到实际行动的时候我是一个堕落兄弟会男生

translation.en: and it's just my frat was the football team.
translation.zh: 只是我的兄弟会是我的橄榄球队

translation.en: I loved what I did. I loved the freedom.
translation.zh: 我喜欢我做的事 我喜欢那种自由

translation.en: I loved being the guy
translation.zh: 我喜欢成为那个

translation.en: that got to go do all these amazing things on and off the field.
translation.zh: 在场上和场下都做很棒事情的人

translation.en: You know, but at some point in time, you have to look back
translation.zh: 但在某个时间点 你必须回头看看

translation.en: and think, "Fuck, was enough ever enough?"
translation.zh: 然后想：“靠 足够就真的够吗？”

translation.en: You know, are you ever gonna be satisfied,
translation.zh: 会有让你满意的时候吗？

translation.en: or you're just gonna continue living that frat-boy life
translation.zh: 还是你要继续一年又一年地

translation.en: for year after year after year
translation.zh: 过兄弟会生活

translation.en: until you finally look up, and you're still living it,
translation.zh: 直到你终于抬头看你还过着这种生活

translation.en: and it's been detrimental to where you wanted to go in life
translation.zh: 这对你人生想怎样发展不利

translation.en: and what you wanted to do.
translation.zh: 你想做什么？

translation.en: You know, it's hard for me to sit back and look at these days.
translation.zh: 你知道 我现在很难回看那些过去

translation.en: It feels like a distant memory for the most part.
translation.zh: 大部分记忆感觉就像是遥远的回忆

translation.en: But, you know, I'm very much on the pursuit of happiness
translation.zh: 但我非常追求快乐

translation.en: in a way more simplistic form than I was years ago.
translation.zh: 比我多年以前简单很多的方式

translation.en: I don't really see myself as the… as the Johnny-Football-craze
translation.zh: 我不觉得自己是强尼·橄榄球热

translation.en: that's kinda… thatt's kinda swept Aggielands. That swept around the nation a little bit.
translation.zh: 算是席卷了德州农工也有点席卷了全国范围

translation.en: Um, I see myself as Johnny Manziel.
translation.zh: 我把自己当成强尼·曼泽尔

translation.en: I'm a guy from Kerrville, Texas, who just tried to be a laid-back guy
translation.zh: 一个来自德州克尔维尔的人想成为一个不拘小节

translation.en: who likes to hang out with my friends
translation.zh: 喜欢跟朋友一起玩的人

translation.en: and be a normal college student just like anybody else.
translation.zh: 像其他人一样 做普通的大学生
